las mchongs pa lha rnams kyis bdag nam mkha' bar snang las bzung ste/ de na bdag gis sems can rnams la bslabs nas sems can rnams chos la sbyor bar byas so/ /de na bdag gis sems can khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po lnga mngon par shes pa dang ldan par

byas so/ /bdag gi tshig gis lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar la btsud cing so sor bkod do/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni de lta bu lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang

chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyangs la legs sa zhes bya ba byin nas rigs kyi bu khyod kyi smon lam de lta bur gyur te/ spyad par dka' ba spyod pa'i seng ge'i sgra de lta bu bsgrags pa ni legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ji ltar sdon gang ga zhes bya ba nyi ma la dga' bar gyur pa de ngas

bskul nas thog mar byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur tam/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon lan 'ga' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa ma mchis so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag thog ma byang

chub sems dpar gyur pa ni 'di lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang po'i thad du mchis te/ de'i tshe da ltar ji skad du brjod pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi

bu khyod gal te sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na smon lam de lta bu sus bslabs/ gsol pa/ de na bdag dben pa zhig tu mchis te/ dog sa la mchis nas smon lam zhig gdab par sems pa de na bdag gi rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbang pos

smon lam de dag bsgo ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar smon lam btab bo/ /de na bdag sems can rnams la snying rje skyes te 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs so/ /de phyis rjes su dpag pa des mchod sbyin smra ba bdag yongs su btang ba bgyis te/ smon lam de lta bu

btab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod lta bar song ba de dag tu zhugs sam/ gsol pa/ ma lags so/ su zhig gi mthus/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das smon lam gyi khyad par gyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu

de de bzhin te/ smon lam gyi khyad par gyis sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs su dgrol gyi/ gzhan gang gi mthus kyang sems can rnams lta bar song ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi phyir lung bstan pa 'di su zhig gi

dus gsum gyi gzugs kyi phung po nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i bar du yin nam/ 'on te dus gsum gyi bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba yang med sdug bsngal yang med pa tshor ba'i skye mched drug po 'di dag gi yin nam/ 'on te tshor ba med pa yin nam/ byang chub

kyi phyir lung bstan pa zhes bya ba 'di su zhig gi yin/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ bdag lung bstan par gsol ba'am bdag lung ston pa'am/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de ma mchis so/ /de ci'i

slad du zhe na/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'di rdzas ma mchis/ dngos po ma mchis/ rang bzhin ma mchis/ cung zad kyang ma mchis/ yi ge ma mchis/ thob pa ma mchis/ brjod du ma mchis pa de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang rdzas ma mchis shing dngos po ma mchis pa nas/ brjod du

ma mchis shing ma skyes pa'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi gzugs 'byung ba ma mchis te lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang ma skyes pa'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dus gsum gyi mig 'byung ba ma mchis shing lta ba'i

mtshan nyid dang nye bar bral ba nas dus gsum gyi nang gi yid kyi bar dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bde ba yang ma mchis sdug bsngal ba yang ma mchis pa'i tshor ba yang ma skyes pa nas lta ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bar du'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dus

gsum gyi gzugs kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos nyid la skye ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ 'jig pa mi dmigs so/ /chos kyi dbyings la yang gnas par mi dmigs te/ ming dang gzugs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /brdar btags pa tsam du yang gzugs kyi

mtshan nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dus gsum gyi rnam par shes pa'i yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la yang brdar btags pa tsam du yang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan

nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni dus gsum gyi mig gi yang dag pa'i mtha' nas brda tsam du btags pa'i mig gi mtshan nyid nas dus gsum gyi nang gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba yang ma mchis/ sdug

bsngal yang ma mchis pa'i bar du yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyi skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'gog pa mi dmigs so/ /yid dang chos kyi khams kyang mi

dmigs so/ /bdag gis ni yid rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni brag ca lta bu ste/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang gis kyang

ma bzung ba'o/ /chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ chu zla lta bu ste/ nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa gang la gang gis kyang ma bzung ba'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin spangs pa'i mtshan nyid bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/ /de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing yongs su gzung du ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang

zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / rab tu stong pa nyid dang / thog ma

dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / mi 'gyur ba stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag bzung ba de ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni rnam grangs 'dis kyang de skad brjod par

bgyi ste/ 'di lta ste/ de ni ma mchis pa'i tshig so/ /'di lta ste/ bdag la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ /lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /lung bstan to snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag ni lung bstan pa yang

dag par rjes su mi mthong / brjod pa dang lung bstan pa dang 'khor ba yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma lags pa dang / lam dang / lam ma lags pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/

dper na de bzhin nyid kyi lam ma mchis shing phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid kyi lam yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de bzhin du gzugs su yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang

dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /mig yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi lam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /lung bstan pa brjod pa 'di'i skabs dang go skabs kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gang gzugs kyi lung

bstan pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / mig nas yid kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa dang / gang byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ kun tu rgyu shin tu rnam par

phye ba'i sas kyang de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /sems can gzhan mu stegs can nga rgyal bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum po de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rab tu thob par gyur to/ /yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ /le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan

'das sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /ting nge 'dzin des sems can gyi skye gnas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi sgra brjod pa'i tshig stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po ting nge 'dzin des skye gnas dang sgra dbyangs kyi tshig brjod pa

thams cad tshim par byed do/ /de la bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge dang smras pa nyon cig /grogs po dag nyon cig /grogs po dag lha dang mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ba dang / lam gang gis nyan thos kyi theg pa rnyed de sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur

ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnyed pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par 'gyur ba bde ba dang zhi ba'i lam ston cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis sgra dbyangs brjod pa de phyogs bcu kun tu skad dang tshig gcig brjod pas yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa

stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi brjod pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /yi ge dang sgra dbyangs brjod pa des sems can thams cad rang rang gi tshig khong du chud par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed sgra dbyangs kyis

rgyas par byed do/ /chu bo gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnyog pa lnga dang ldan pa de'i sems can ngan par song ba rnams kyi rna lam du yang grag go/ /de nas sems can de dag rang rang gi tshig kun tu shes nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar yid du 'ong ba 'di

ltar snyan pa/ 'di ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di su'i tshig bdag cag la zhi ba dang bde ba'i lam ston pa'i sems can gyi snying po 'di su zhig /lam gang bstan pas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob/ nyan thos kyis ni ci 'dra ba zhig /rang

sangs rgyas kyisa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyisa'ang ci 'dra ba zhig /lam gang thob na bdag cag lus kyi bde ba'i tshor ba thams cad byang zhing sdug bsngal thams cad byang ste/ lus kyi g.yeng ba thams cad srab par gyur/ de bas na

bdag cag gis bsti stang du byas te mnyan par bya snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag bcu po 'di dag ni dge ba'i las kyi lam ste/ des lha dang mir skye ba rab tu 'thob/ sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba nyan thos kyi theg pa yang

'thob/ sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba 'thob bo/ /dge ba'i las kyi lam des sems can thams cad kyi mchog dam pa khyad par can phul/ byams pa chen po/ snying rje chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can

thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de la dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu po gang zhe na/ dge ba'i las kyi lam gang dang ldan na sems can rnams myur du lha dang mir skye ba 'thob pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob

par 'gyur ba ste/ de la grogs po dag lha dang mi rnyed nas dge ba'i las kyi lam la brtson par bya'o/ /sbyin pa sbyin no/ /tshul khrims srung ngo / /'du shes bcu bsgom par bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam par 'du shes bsgom par bya'o/ /

gang gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par rnags par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par sngos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par dmar bar 'du shes pa dang / 'bus gang bar 'du shes

pa dang / rnam par zos par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes pa dang / keng rus su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tshig par 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bar 'du shes pa bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i

bar du thob cing sdug bsngal thams cad zad pa thob ste/ mir gyur pa thob nas kyang yang gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes bcu gnyis bsgom par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / zhi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs rgyu ba rjes su dran

pa dang / lhag mthong rjes su dran pa'i 'du shes 'di bsgom par bya'o/ /gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su thob cing mir gyur pa thob nas kyang sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / sdom pas sems can thams cad la bdud rtsi'i ror 'gron bya bar bya'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa

drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /drug gang zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra skad

dang / dbyangs brjod pas sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'di lta ste/ da ltar gyi bzhin du bde ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag rnams ni gor ma chag par snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i spobs

pa mthong ngo snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can de dag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang gA'i bye ma dang mnyam

pa stong par gyur pa'i rnyog pa lnga'i sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed du sprul pa'i phyir sems can tshangs pa la mos pa de dag gi mdun du ni tshangs pa'i gzugs su so sor gnas shing chos ston to/ /la la dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par

len du 'dzud la 'jug par byed cing so sor 'god do/ /sems can la la dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la'o/ /la la dag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la'o/ /la la dag ni dge ba'i las kyi lam la sbyor bas lha dang mi rnams kyi phyir ro/ /gang dbang phyug la mos pa

nas/ glang po la glang po'i gzugs kyi bar dang / rta la rta'i gzugs dang / yi dwags la yi dwags kyi gzugs dang / sems can dmyal ba pa la sems can dmyal ba pa'i gzugs kyis de dag gi mdun du 'dug ste chos ston to/ /sems can dmyal ba pa'i

sems can la la dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa nas lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang sbyor te/ sems can gang dag der sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag bskyed pa de dag ni de bas kyang brtan par byas so/ /sems can gang dag sngon

dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams ni der bskyed do/ /sems can gang dad pa'i rgyu des ngan song gsum po de dag las shi 'phos nas lha dang mir skyes pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer

yang tshad med grangs med pa'i chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun to/ /la la dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa rab tu thob bo/ /la la dag ni de lta bu'i bzod pa dang / ting nge

'dzin dang / gzungs rab tu thob ste/ bzod pa dang / gzungs ji snyed thob pa'i stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gan du lhags so/ /gang rkyen la 'jug pa'i theg pa la sems bskyed de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun

pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang gA'i grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dag las kha cig ni gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho zhing skyong la/ sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du dong ngo / /kha cig ni

phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas so/ /de bzhin du gang nyan thos kyi theg par sems bskyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong chu klung gang gA grangs

med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems can gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rnam par gnas pa lha dang mi'i lam thob par gyur pa chu klung gang gA grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma snyed dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig

brgya stong smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes so/ /la la dag ni smon lam gyi dbang gis de nas shi 'phos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te 'tsho skyong zhing byang chub sems dpa'

dag pa'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag tu skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang / kun tu spyod pa dang / bde ba'i yo byad sna tshogs cho ma cho dgu grangs med dpag tu med pa

byung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ de'i tshe ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /'jig rten dag na mkhas pa gang / /blo dang ldan zhing 'jigs med pa/ /byang chub tu ni sems bsngos shing / /bya bar dka' ba rnams kyang spyod/ /

pha yi dngos po rnam par ston/ /sems can sdug bsngal smin par byed/ /bdud bzhi dag kyang 'dul bar byed/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba thob/ /sbyin pa sdom pa sdom pa yis/ /sems can rnams la las ston cing / /theg pa gsum la sbyor ba yis/ /de dag thar pa'i skal ba

thob/ /gang dag ngan 'gro gsum gnas pa/ /sdug bsngal gnod las thar byed cing / /de dag sems ni dang byas nas/ /lha dang mir ni rab tu khrid/ /dge ba'i chos la rab sbyor zhing / /gang dang gang la mos pa dag /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/ /de dag

sangs rgyas 'thun par 'gyur/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gnyis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar

gyur pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu 'khrol/ me tog gi char yang rab tu bab/ a ga ru dang / ta ga ra dang / dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan dang / sbrul gyi snying po tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char dag kyang rab tu phab/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / yid

bzhin gyi na bza' dang / dar gyi lda ldi'i phreng ba dang / gser gyi lcag pod dang / mu tig gi se mo do dang / dpung rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings kyang brgyan to/ /klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las la brtson pas mu tig gi se mo do rnam

pa sna tshogs cho ma cho dgu'i char kyang rab tu phab bo/ /byams pa dang 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po la sogs pa yang byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar

nas bcom ldan 'das la tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba slad ma dag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin dag de skad ma zer cig /ma

'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i dus kyi bar dag tu gang dag rigs bzhi'i 'khor mi dad pa dag 'byung ste/ spyod pa ngan pa/ tshul khrims ngan pa/ gzhogs slong byed pa/ thos pa nyung ba/ ser sna can/ spyod pa ma rungs pa/ sdig pa'i lta bar gnas pa/ rtag pa dang chad pa la lta ba phal

cher 'byung ngo / /'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba/ rgyu dang 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod pa/ gcig la gcig ngan du sems shing bdag stong pa nas mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar dang ldan pa dag 'byung ngo / /rgyal po yang chos dang ldan pa mi 'byung ste/ 'dod

pa yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skabs tshol ba/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim na gnas pa mchod par 'os pa dag la brnyas pa shin tu byed cing mchod pa'i 'os ma yin pa la dad de/ gzhogs slong can/ g.yo sgyu can/ tshul khrims ngan pa can/ thos

pa nyung ba bsod nams chung ba/ snying rje chung ba/ yid mi gzhungs pa/ log par zhugs pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la rgyal po gus par byed cing zhe sa byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing kun tu 'dzin to/ /de dag kyang nyin dang mtshan

du bde ba 'dor zhing 'phral gang du rgyal po'i dgos pa ma rungs pa dag spyod de/ rgyal po yang 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba du smra ba mang ba 'byung ste/ rgyal po'i skyon de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro'o/ /byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni dgon pa dang / nags tshal gyi gnas su sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / chog shes pa dang / btang snyoms la gnas so/ /gang yul de yongs su skyong ba'i lha de dag kyang yid mi dga' bar gyur te/ yul gyi phan pa dang / dgos pa

thams cad yal bar 'dor ro/ /yul de yang 'khor gnyis kyis 'khrug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i nyes pas de na sems can rnams nad mang bar 'gyur te/ tshogs dang bral ba/ dran pa nyams pa/ chos ma yin pa tshol ba/ myur du rga ba/ myur du 'khogs pa/ myur du 'chi

bar 'gyur ro/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dag tu 'di lta bu'i yul 'khrug par 'gyur na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su la yongs su gtang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dag tu ri mor bya bar mi 'os pa 'chal pa'i shes rab can/ brlang ba/ brkam pa/ nor la

dga'i chos la mi dga' ba tshig la dad kyi dgos pa la ma yin pa/ mi sems pa/ gzhogs slong can/ che zhing gzhan 'drid par sems pa dag 'byung ngo / /gang dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim na gnas pa/ mkhas pa chos 'dod pa/ chos smra ba de dag la ri

mor mi byed/ mi lta'i/ zer ba'i tshig la dga' zhing brnyas pa/ chos ma yin pa'i tshig thos na bya bar sems pa 'byung ngo / /gang bsod nams chung ba dang / shes rab chung ba dang / tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / gzhogs slong can dang / brlang ba dang / bdag stod

pa dang / gzhan smod pa dang / lta ba ma rungs pa dang / 'phral gang du sems kyi lus dang ngag mi sdom pa dang / chos 'dzin pa'i sems med pa dang / sdig pa la dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / khyim na gnas pa de dag kyang ri mor bya ba ma yin

pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i zham ring ba la nor gyi phung pos rjes su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /nor gyi stobs de dang / du smra ba'i stobs des ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i rgyal po'i zham ring ba rnams la yang mchod cing rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /ri mor bya ba ma yin

pa'i rgyal ba'i zham ring ba'i tshig nyan cing byed de mchod pa nas rgyal po la mchod par gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du'o/ /ri mor bya ba ma yin pa'i bar gyi nyes pas chos kyi phyogs tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /chos ma yin pa'i phyogs bslang bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang btang snyoms kyi bar la bsam gtan byed par 'gyur na ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di su zhig la gtad par bya/ gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma lnga brgya'i bar dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshe na khyim gyi gnas nas byung ste/ bdag

brtson par sems shing de dag mi dad pa dang / tshul khrims ngan pa dang / shes rab 'chal cing khyim dang / rigs dang / gnas dang / yul dang / rnyed pas chos la ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/ /gcig la gcig gnod par sems pa dang / gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'i skabs

tshol ba dang / gzhan las rnyed cing rim gro byas na yid dga' ba dang / yul dam pa rnyed pa'i dge slong rnams la dmod pa dang / gzhan gyi gnas dang / grong khyer dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la slu ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnal 'byor yid la byed pa dang / so sor

rtog pa zhi ba dang bde ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang / zas dang / skom gyi ro la brkam pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la brtson pa 'byung ngo / /khyim na gnas pa rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ /chos 'dod pa rnams la brnyas pa shin tu byed pas chos smra ba'i dge 'dun

rnams gtsug lag khang gi gnas spangs te/ dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan dag na btang snyoms la bsam gtan 'cha' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar chos ma yin pa'i phyogs kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan

du dong ngo / /la la dag ni dgon par btang snyoms kyi bar la gnas so/ /gang yul de yongs su skyong ba'i lha de dag kyang btang snyoms la gnas so/ /yul der mu ge dang / nad dang / thab mo yang 'byung ngo / /der sems can rnams gcig la gcig 'ching zhing gsod de/ de

dag gcig la gcig 'jigs pas log par lta ba gzhan la skyabs su 'gro na/ ngas 'di lta bu'i zab mo chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi bzod pa 'di su zhig la yongs su gtad par bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang /

dri za dang / lha ma yin mthu chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la bzod pa 'di bdag cag gi sug par gtad du gsol/ pho brang 'khor gang dang yul gang na zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la bzod pa 'di

rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i yul der bdag cag 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba dang / dgung char mi 'bab pa dang / bro nad dang / gzhan gyi 'khor bzlog pa la spro bar bgyi'o/ /chos smra ba dang / chos 'tshal ba dang / chos dgod pa'i gang zag rnams

bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /rgyal po dang / blon po dang / zham ring ba dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs na gnas pa rnams chos dang ldan pa la sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin dag legs so legs so/ /spobs pa bzang ngo / /brtson pa bzang ngo / /'jigs pa med pa/

khro ba mi snyan pa/ brnyas ma shin byed pa/ bkres pa/ skom pa/ dbyug pas 'tshog pa/ grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / rlung gis gdungs kyang dam pa'i chos kyi mig gnas kyi bar du yul dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 'or gyi grong dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du chos kyi

mig 'di la brtson par bya ba dang / zab mo chos thams cad kyi sgo'i gzhi dang / bzod pa 'di rab tu bstan pa dang / bzod pa 'di la sems can yang rab tu sbyor ba dang / gang bzod pa 'di bsgom pa dang klog pa dang / gzhan la'ang lung 'bog pa dang / klog tu 'jug pa dang / gang yang nyan pa dang /

'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de dag la spro bar bya ba dang / chos dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa sgrub par khyed las su dag spro bar 'gyur/ de'i tshe byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs

su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams sbyar bar bgyi ba'i bar dang / gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam la 'drir stsal ba de dag bdag cag

chos dang ldan pa la sbyor ba bgyi bar spro'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu chen po'i byed pa bya ba dang / ji ltar rigs kyi bu khyed yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di thob pa ni legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu ji

tsam du bzod pa 'di'i stobs dang / brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin cing brtson pa la dmigs pa de tsam du stobs dang brtson pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la brtson par dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / gling bzhi pa thams cad dang / yul dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong

rdal dang / ljongs thams cad du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byos shig /rgyal po la ma g.yo bar byos shig /blon po dang / zham ring ba rnams kyang yal bar ma gtang shig /rigs kyi bu gang rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du da ltar nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan 'phel bar 'gyur gyi bar du

sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi skyo bar spro zhing sdig pa 'dod pa log par lta ba'i sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug pa dang / rab tu dgod pa dang / nyes pa mang ba'i shas che ba'i sems can rnams khyim gyi gnas nas phyung ste/ zhi ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing sbyor ba dang /

bslab pa'i gnas la rab tu 'god pa dang / nyes pa mang pos nyen la/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa'i tshul can gyi sems can rnams bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa la sbyor zhing so sor 'god pa dang dgon pa bas mtha'i mal stan la

mngon par dga' la sems can yang de la sbyor zhing de dag phan pa la sbyor ba dang / ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la sbyor ba nas/ 'chal pa'i shes rab can sdig pa'i bas mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ lta ba'i thibs po la gnas pa rnams 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi stobs la sbyor zhing so sor 'god de/

sems can sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis non pa rnams yongs su thar bar byed pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang bar 'phel lo/ /'di la gang nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus nyin mtshan bdun du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir skyo ba bzod

cing bzod pa'i stobs kyi mthu 'dis sems can yongs su smin par byed cing chung ngu na bzod pa 'di yang dag par len du 'dzud de/ sems can rnams la ston cing tshig tu 'don pa dang / glegs bam la 'drir 'jug pa ni bsod nams rab tu mang du 'phel te/ yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing

dag tu byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa chu klung gang gA bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed du mi 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang bzhin gyis snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can chen po

de dag ni dgos pa chen po la brtson pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sems can chen po de dag ni brtson 'grus che ba/ shes rab kyis brgyan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni rab tu myur bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/ /gang nyon

mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa'i stobs bskyed pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa nas/ glegs bam la 'drir 'jug pa'i bar du sbyor zhing dam pa'i chos 'jig pa na chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar

byed pas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di bsngags pa de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu klung gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa grangs ma mchis

pa dag tu mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par brtsams te/ da ltar nas ma mchis pa'i dus kyi bar du nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba thams cad btang ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mchi bar sdom pa

blangs pa las da ni bdag cag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sdom pa blangs te ma mchis pa'i dus na/ slar zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par mi bgyid do/ /smon lam gyi dbang gis bdag cag rnams yongs su ma dag pa nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing du spyad pa spyod par bgyi'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma mchis pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag brtson 'grus chen po la dmigs te byang chub sems dpa' gang de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba'i sems can thams

cad yongs su smin par byed pa legs so legs so/ /snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing pha rol tu phyin pa chen po spyad de mngon par shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po la gzhan la rag ma lus shing ye shes chen po'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

gang yongs su ma dag cing nyon mongs pa rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su nyams pa'i sems can rnams dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na ci nas kyang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'dis sems can yongs su smin par gyis shig /rigs kyi bu yul gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i

mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad pa'i yul der yon tan gyi khyad par dang / dpal phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i rgyal po yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rgyal po nad med par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa nyung

zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ba dang / rdul dang bral zhing rgol ba dang dgra med par 'gyur ba dang / stobs dang rtsal thags thogs med cing dga' ba mang la chos 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar klu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod

sbyin gyi bdag po rnams kyis rab tu srung bar 'gyur te/ bzhin dag dang de la de ltar mnyam pa med do/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin gyi bdag po rnams kyis tshig 'thun par gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags te/ yul gang

du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i rgyal por 'gyur ba de'i slad bzhin du bdag cag 'brang zhing gnod pa las bskyab par bgyi'o/ /bro nad zhi bar bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /de dgra las bskyab par bgyi'o/ /dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang chos la dga' ba nye

bar bstan par bgyi'o/ /stobs dang rtsal thags thogs ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhin dag legs so legs so/ /khyod ji skad smras pa bzhin du nyams su long shig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'os dang

ldan pa'i rgyal po yul gang du chos dang ldan par 'gyur bar bdag cag mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid dang / 'khor 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ yul gang du bzod pa 'di rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der rgyal

po'i zha 'bring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang / legs pa bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul der rgyal po'i zha 'bring ba dang / blon po rnams phan tshun bzod pa dang / des pa dang / dga' ba dang / gus pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po yang byams par 'gyur

ba dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / ljongs kyi mi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / chos 'dod par 'gyur gyi rnyed pa mi 'dod de/ phyogs bcur grags pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher grags

shing tshe ring ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba ste/ yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de ni rgyal po'i zha 'bring ba dang / blon po rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags par 'gyur ba ni de dag go/ /gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der

dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa bzhi 'byung ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul der dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dag rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba dang / ri la

mngon par dga' zhing rab tu dben par 'gyur ba dang / sems las byung ba'i bde ba bzhi la gnas pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul de'i grong rdal dang ljongs kyi mi rnams legs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khron pa dang / chu mig

dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gnod pa med par 'gyur ba dang / las kyi mtha' grub par 'gyur ba dang / sbyin pa'i gnas snod du gyur pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba'o/ /gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba'i yul der bud med rnams kyi legs pa bzhi 'byung bar

'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul de'i bud med phrag dog dang khro ba rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang / skye bo thams cad la bzod par 'gyur ba dang / bu rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nad nyung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /gzhan yang bud med gang bzod pa 'di nyan pa de la dad pa rnyed cing chos smra ba la

phan par zer ba de ni bud med du gyur pa'i tha ma yin te/ snying po byang chub kyi bar du bud med thob par mi 'gyur te/ gzhan du na bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa ni ma gtogs so/ /gzhan yang yul gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba dag na gzhan gyi 'khor dang / nang gi 'khor

gyis yul la gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char dang / grang dro dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu smyung dang / sbrang ma dang / byi ba dang / 'gro ba khro bo dang / sbrul khro bo dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / ro bro ba med pa dang /

rtsub pa dang / sre mo dang / mi bde bar reg pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog dang / dbyig pa dang / gshe ba dang / mi snyan par zer ba dang / rdeg pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nad kyi gnod pa yul de na med par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod

sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dag gis kyang yul de shin tu srung zhing skyob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag yul gang du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di 'chad cing ston par 'gyur ba'i yul der gnod pa bcu po de dag gi yul thams cad mi gtse bar

'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu bzod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nas sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su thob par byed pa'o/ /bzod pa 'di'i ming 'ba'

zhig gang gi rna lam du thos pa yang snying po byang chub kyi bar du gang zag de mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gis bzod pa bsgom pa 'di thog thag nyan pa ni sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ de ltar

mthu che ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' bar byed pa/ rgyun du byed pa/ phyir mi ldog par byed pa/ rnam par rtsen par byed pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ gzugs zhi bar byed pa/ yongs su smin par byed pa/ 'bral bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su mya ngan las

'da' bar byed pa'o/ /bzod pa 'di de ltar bstan pa na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul

nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di sems can rnams la bshad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par dgod par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag da gang gi dus la bab par sems na'o/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas

'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog ban du 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ gnas dang /

grong dang grong khyer dang / ljongs gang du bzod pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dang de dag tu me tog ban du 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar de bzhin du gnyi ga byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang

chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang / gling bzhi pa gang dang / yul dang grong khyer dang / grong dang ljongs dang / 'or gyi grong dag tu rigs kyi bu pho'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag byang chub don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba de dag tu bzod pa 'di sgom pa dang / 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang dran pa dang spyod par 'gyur ro/ /

bzod pa 'di gang na spyod pa der me tog ban du 'di spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyogs bcu nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'khor gyi 'jig rten thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu
dga' ste mngon par bstod do// //yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs // //

@##/ /bod skad du/ 'phags pa thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs te sangs rgyas su grub par rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos

pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgyad khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun sum khri drug stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de dag kun kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ sgrib pa thams cad dang

yongs su bral ba/ gzi brjid dang dpal gyi dbang phyug dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsang ba'i don thabs kyis bskul ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba lhun gyis grub pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par bkod pa/

chos kyi sde snod srung zhing skyob pa'i phyir theg pa chen po'i mdo gzungs su 'dzin cing seng ge'i sgras phyogs bcur chos kyi 'brug sgra chen po sgrogs pa/ de dag gi yon tan gyi go 'phang ni ri rab dang 'dra la/ shes rab zab cing rgya che ba ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste/ bdud kyi sde dpung dang bcas par btul ba/

mu stegs thams cad sdud cing sems rnam par byang ba la 'jog pa/ mthu stobs dang ldan pas rnam par grol ba la thogs pa med pa/ mnyam pa nyid la bde bar gnas pa/ dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin kun tu bzung ba/ bstan pa la mos shing blo gros dang ldan pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /

pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / thabs la mkhas pa dpag tu med pas chos thams cad kyi don dang mi ldan pa med pa/ skye bo rnams kyi yid bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba/ yod pa dang med pa shes pa'i shes rab dang ldan pas chos kyi rnam grangs la mkhas pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin

la bzhugs te spyan lngas sems can rnams kyi dbang po rtogs pa/ gzi brjid dang dpal dpag tu med pa skye bo mang po rnams bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis sems su sbyangs te mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan cing mchog dang ldan par byed pa/ sems nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ 'jig rten gyi

gzugs dang kha dog yongs su btang ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid la mkhas pa/ rang gi rig pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis sems can gang nas gang du 'khor bar shes pa/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang ldan pas mnyam pa med pa la bsnyen pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun ring po nas bskyed pas sangs

rgyas kyi dbang phyug thob pa/ ye shes dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa brgyad dang ldan pa/ bzang 'gro'i sgo ni phye/ ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgo ni bkag ste/ sems can kun la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar snyoms par bstan pa'i phyir lam rgyud lngar skye zhing lus

ston par byed pa/ sems can rnams nyon mongs pa las bsgral ba'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu zhing 'khor ba la gnas te/ nad gso ba'i cho ga la mkhas pas nad kyi rkyen bzhin du sman byin nas 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byed pa/ gang gis thos kyang ma grol ba med pa de lta bu'i yon tan

tshad med pa dang ldan pa/ sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med pa la mchod pa myong ba/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid shin tu rig pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yun du gnas par shes pa/ rtag par yang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod par bshad pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi g.yo dang / byang chub sems dpa' klu shing ljon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang / byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi bla dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub

sems dpa' rtag 'grus dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid la dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thub med dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sum khri drug stong dang / mthu

stobs dang ldan pa'i lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin la sogs te grangs med dpag tu med pa'i

lha dang lhan cig tu nam mkha' la 'khod de/ lha'i rin po che'i me tog gi char phab nas rol mo sil snyan yang grangs med dpag tu med pa sgra rang 'byin pa byas te/ lha tshangs pas sam b+ha ra'i spos kyi bdug pa dri zhim pos bdugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin phung phyogs

bcu'i 'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams kun tu khyab par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i chos thams cad dang / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun thams cad la kun tu mchod yon gsol bar gyur to/ /de ltar lha rnams kyis

mchod pa phul ba yang theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i lam tshol ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba de dag dang thabs cig tu shing sA la chen po ga la ba de logs su gshegs nas dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes lnga la

mya ngan las 'da' ba'i khar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad sdud cing skyob par dgongs te/ gsung dbyangs chen po phyung nas sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par so so'i skad bzhin du sems can thams cad la bka' stsal pa/ deng ni de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can la thugs brtse bar dgongs so/ /sems can la srung zhing skyob par dgongs so/ /sems can sdud cing gzhes par dgongs so/ /sems can la snyoms par gzigs pa ni dper na bu gcig

la lta ba dang 'dra bar rten med pa la rten bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid ma mthong ba ni mthong bar bya'o/ /nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni bral bar bya'o/ /bde ba med pa ni bde bar bya'o/ /ma grol ba ni rnam par grol bar bya'o/ /longs spyod med pa ni longs spyod dang ldan par bya'o/ /

the tsom dang ma bral ba ni the tsom dang bral bar bya'o/ /'gyod tshangs ma byas pa ni 'gyod pa tshangs par bya'o/ /mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de'i tshe de'i dus na lam gyi g.yas g.yon du sa gzhi mnyam pa thang bzang po yongs su dag pa/ bkra shis kyi sa

chu zheng du mnyam par dpag tshad stong phrag bcu bcu yod pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzigs nas mod la der gzhes te/ dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnas 'di ni chos bshad pa'i sar 'os so zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong kun dga' bos bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon rtag tu ri dang / tshal dang / chab gtsang ma 'bab pa dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / me tog dag mchis pa la dgyes na deng 'dir ni chab 'bab pa yang ma mchis/ shing dang tshal yang ma mchis/ grong

khyim dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / mi phal yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das 'dir ci la dgyes te bzhugs shing chos bshad ces gsungs/ phal shul ring po nas mchi ba/ bkres skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa'i sems can rnams srog kyang mi 'tsho ste/ zas mchis

na ni srog mchis/ srog mchis na ni lus mchis/ lus mchis na ni chos lam yang mchis so/ /zas ma mchis na srog ma mchis/ srog ma mchis na lus ma mchis/ lus ma mchis na chos lam yang ma mchis pa lags nad 'di'i nang du 'di lta bu'i yid la bab pa gang

yang ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'dir chos bshad ces gsungs/ de nas shes rab chen po sha ra dwa ti'i bus sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kun dga' bo la smras pa/ sngar chos kyi phyir zhu ba'i rigs kyi gzhan ni bsam mi dgos so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni stobs

bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhir ma zad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la stobs dpag tu med pa dang / cis kyang mi bsnyengs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dpag tu med pa dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa mnga' ste/ gang rten med pa de'i ni rten du mdzad/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo

nyid ma mthong ba ni mthong bar mdzad/ nyon mongs pa dang ma bral ba ni nyon mongs pa dang bral bar mdzad/ bde ba med pa ni bde ba la reg par mdzad/ ma grol ba ni rnam par grol bar mdzad/ longs spyod dang mi ldan pa ni longs spyod dang ldan par mdzad/ mya ngan las ma 'das pa ni

yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa la rang 'byung med pa'i mya ngan bya ci dgos/ bdag dran pa sngon dra ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas phal mang po la chos bstan pa na 'jig rten gyi

khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i lha dang / klu la sogs pa'i phal mang po khang pa'i nang du 'dus te 'khod pa'i tshe na zas dag mi snang nas/ bdag gis de'i tshe na phal mang po 'di rnams kyi zas ji ltar 'byor

snyam bsams pa las dri ma med par grags pas bdag la smras pa/ nyan thos shes rab dman pa yang dag pa'i chos bsam pa'i rigs kyi thog ma nas zas dang / gos dang / khri stan la sogs pa sgyu ma'i rdzas la ci'i phyir rnam par rtog ces dra ma chen po dri ma med par grags pas de

skad smras pa'i tshe lha dang / mi rnams ni chos lam thob bdag ni skyengs te khyod da ltar smras pa yang de dang 'dra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo blo gros kyi mchog sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa bden te/ theg pa chen po bsam pa'i rigs kyi lus bde ba'i

phyir bsam pa ni ma yin no/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin tu zhugs nas byin gyi rlabs kyi mod las der gser gyi me tog gcig 'bus nas byung ste/ de'i 'phang du dpag tshad khri phrag bzhi bcu yod la/ des stong khams kun kyang chub par g.yogs nas bai dUr+ya'i dra bas kyang

gser gyi me tog khyab par g.yogs te/ me tog de'i 'og tu rin po che'i khrus kyi rdzing bu yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu gtsang mas yongs su gang ba/ de'i ngos bzhir me tog sna tshogs rnam pa mang po la 'di lta ste/ me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dang / pun da rI ka la sogs pa rnam pa

mang po dpag tu med pas rin po che'i rdzing rnam par brgyan pa byung nas/ gang la la zhig gis gser gyi me tog dang / rin po che'i rdzing bu mthong ba tsam gyis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob na nang du zhugs te khrus byas pa lta ci smos/ gal te zhugs te khrus byas pa ni rnam par dag pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos

la bzod pa thob bo/ /gser gyi me tog de'i 'og tu seng ge'i khri rin po che las byas pa/ 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa byung ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che'i khri de la bzhugs nas sku'i ba spu'i bu ga dang / yan lag kun nas 'od zer chen po btang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer yang

gser gyi me tog gi kha dog dang 'thun par phyogs bzhir byung bas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du khyab par snang bar byas pa'i gnas thams cad du ri lung dang / yul sa kun kyang mnyam par gyur nas thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ sme btsogs pa yang med la sems can dmyal

ba yang zhi nas yi dwags kyang rnam par grol te/ log spyod dang dam pa'i chos la smod pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang / dbus kyi khams 'di dang 'dra bar gyur nas tha dad pa med do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang 'od zer de gzigs

nas so so nas tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes pas bstod nas legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das byams pa chen pos 'od zer btang ba 'di ni sngon gyi 'od zer dang mi 'dra ste/ sngon chad kyi 'od ni shar phyogs su sngar shar na/ deng gi 'od ni phyogs bzhi nas

dus gcig tu phyogs bcur khyab par shar ba las bltas na 'od des ni sdug bsngal ba'i sems can thams cad khams gsum nas bton te/ mya ngan las bzla bar mngon no zhes gsungs so/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis so so'i 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'od zer chen po gtong ba ni gdon mi za bar dam pa'i chos bstan cing sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba las bsgral

gyi cha na/ khyed rnams 'jig rten gyi khams der song la/ sangs rgyas de la mchod pa phul nas the tsom rnams zhu zhing chos kyi rnam grangs nyan cing gsol ba'i rigs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can yongs kyis ngan cing khro la rdzun sgyu can te/ theg pa gcig la ma dad pas

de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byams pa chen pos thabs sna tshogs kyis theg pa gsum du phye ste/ srid pa gsum las rnam par grol bar byed do/ /theg pa gsum du bstan gyis kyang thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa

yongs su dkar ba ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni bskal pa khri phrag brgya stong du yang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do cog kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ 'khor de dag kyang tshogs 'dus par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gdan khri dang / gser gyi

me tog khyad par can la bzhugs pa yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas na khyed rnams 'jig rten der song la/ sangs rgyas de mthong zhing the tsom dag zhu na khyed rnams kyang bsod nams thob la/ skye bo kun la phan pa dang / bde bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu phyogs

bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu bcu rang rang gi gnas nas langs te/ so so'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas/ thabs cig tu dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' re re yang rol mo rnam pa brgya stong thogs te/ me tog rin po che mchog tu bzang po'i char

phab nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas so so nas tshig gcig dang / ngag gcig dang / sgra gcig gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis na skye bo rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phas byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag the tsom

yod na de kun dris shig dang / ngas khyed rnams la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig las mi bshad na/ 'dir

bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du theg pa gsum du bshad ces gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed rnams sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs kyis

nyon cig rigs kyi bu rnams dper na mi gcig la ming gsum yod pa lta bu ste/ chung ngu'i tshe na ni byis pa zhes bya/ lo nyi shu yan chad la ni skyes bu zhes bya/ lo brgyad cu yan chad 'das pa ni rgan po zhes bya'o/ /nga'i theg pa gsum yang de dang 'dra ste/ sems rgya chung ngu nyan thos la ni theg

pa chung ngur bstan/ sems rgya 'bring po rang sangs rgyas la ni theg pa 'bring po bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam chen po la zhugs pa la ni theg pa chen po bstan to/ /rigs kyi bu khyed rnams yang nyon cig /mdor mtha' gnyis med pa dang phyogs gcig tu 'thun te/

shes pa'i sgo tha dad kyang mtha' gcig tu 'du'o/ /mdo ni theg pa gcig ste/ thabs spyad pas gsum du bgos kyis kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang theg pa chen po'i nang du 'du la/ theg pa chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/ /de bas na theg pa gsum yang

theg pa gcig go zhes chos 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /dge slong brgyad brgyas ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob/ lha nyi khris ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob/ mi las khri phrag brgya stong ni mod la bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas phyogs bcu nas phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs kyis khams 'dir phyin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ba'i steng du theg pa chen po'i chos kyang thos na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag cag gis blangs te gzungs su 'dzin par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na

'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du ri dang / nags dang / tshal dang / shing drung dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i gnas dang / grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / dgon pa dang / dur khrod dang / mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun gyi gnas

khang dang / chos ston pa'i sa mang po 'du ba dang / khyim pa'i gnas so so'i khyim khyim du rgya cher spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas nang na 'gro kun bkag par 'gyur ro/ /sngon de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pas sems

can dmyal ba'i sgo bcad ces thos te/ gang gis mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig bton na lha rnams kyang rab tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes te/ rtag tu bsnyen bkur bgyid cing rang bzhin gyis dge ba spyod do/ /gang la las thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo 'di thos te/ dga' ba skyes nas dad

pa dang gus pa'i sems kyis yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ klog gam/ kha ton tu byas sam/ blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ phyag 'tshal zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig gam/ byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig brjod na gang zag de ni tshe 'di

nyid la bde ba thob ste/ sdig pa rnams mi mthong zhing tshe zad de 'chi 'phos na yang byang chub sems dpa' bdag cag rnams kyis sngon du lam drangs te/ bdag cag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par gnas gcig tu skye bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mdo sde 'di blangs pa dang /

gzungs su 'dzin pa'i slad du'o/ /mdo sde 'di blangs te/ gzungs su 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' lags par mngon te/ de bas na de dag ni bdag cag dang bslab pa gcig go/ /rgyu dang rkyen des na mdo sde 'di gzungs su 'dzin pa

rnams gnas gcig tu skye zhing mi 'bral bar smon to/ /de nas tshangs pa chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la sogs pa dang / klu'i rgyal

po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dbyangs can dang / 'phrog ma mo dang / ri'i lha dang / shing gi lha dang / klung gi lha dang / mtsho'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / chu'i lha dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha la sogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa

dag rang rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar cing gus pas phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di la rtag tu

bsrung zhing 'dzin par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde 'di gang du gnas pa der bdag cag gis rtag tu mdun du bdar te yongs su dag par bgyi'o/ /mdo sde 'di mchod rten du'am gnas khang du'am/ khyim pa'i khyim du'am/ dgon pa na gnas kyang rung ste/ gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis sug

pa mi gtsang bas mdo sde 'di bzung ngam/ ma gus par bklags sam/ kha ton du bgyis na bdag cag gis gang zag de 'gro sdod 'dug nyal spyod lam rnam bzhir lus dang sems mi bde bar bgyi'o/ /de gang du gnas pa der 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / glo bur du gnod pa 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /

tshe 'di la mi bde ba sna tshogs dang / tshe 'phos na yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar bgyi'o/ /gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la gus par bgyis te/ sug pa gtsang mas blangs shing 'chang ngam/ khrus bgyis te bdug spos kyis bdug cing bklags sam/ kha ton du bgyis sam/ 'chang ngam

'dzin tam/ yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ rjes su dran nam sdig pa'i chos rnams ma spyad na bdag cag gis mdo sde 'di bsrung ba'i slad du gang zag de'i rim gro bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /gang zag de nyal na yang de'i mdun du mchis te/ ltas ngan pa rnams mi 'byung bar bgyi'o/ /yang

gcig tu na dgra ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnod pas mi tshugs par bgyi'o/ /de gang du gnas pa'i khang khyim yang bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ste 'gron du mchi na bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu phyin 'brang zhing ci 'tshal ba sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /phyogs bzhir gang

du mchi na yang bgegs ma mchis par rgyun tu dge ba'i chos mthong zhing tshe 'phos na yang lhar skye bar bgyi'o/ /rgyu de dang rkyen des ni sangs rgyas mthong zhing theg pa chen po mi stong bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / lha dang /

lha ma yin gyi bdag po la sogs pa la bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ khyed rnams kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ mdo sde 'di thos par yang mi 'gyur na mthong bar lta ga la 'gyur/ gal te mdo sde 'di blangs te bzung ngam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kha ton du byed par

'dod na khrus dag par byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khang pa dben pa gtsang ma'i nang du ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs kyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan dan dang / phye ma dang / byug pas mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas de ltar nyin mtshan dus drug tu thog mar mgo

btsugs nas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin re re zhing mdo sde 'di bklags te/ sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa mi g.yeng ba dang / bsam pa mi g.yeng ba dang / gzungs su 'dzin pa mi g.yeng ba dang / spyod pa mi g.yeng ba dang / bstan cing bslab pa mi g.yeng bar nyin

mtshan dus drug tu mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing klog pa'am/ kha ton tu 'don cing mos pa dang gus par byed nus na mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur gyis/ de

la the tsom mam yid gnyis su ma byed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /'di ni bsrung zhing skyob pa ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum mo/ /'di ni mdo sde kun gyi rgyal po'o/ /'di ni don dam pa'i snying po

'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo/ /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde zab mo 'di ni 'jig rten na chen po drug dang 'dra ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /drug po gang zhe na/ sa chen po dang / chu chen po dang / me chen po dang / rlung chen po dang / nyi ma chen po dang / nam

mkha' chen po'o/ /mdo sde 'di ni sa chen po dang 'dra ste/ gtsang sme dang / bzang ngan thams cad theg par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni chu chen po dang 'dra ste/ sme btsog thams cad 'khru bar byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni me chen po dang 'dra ste/ nyon mongs pa dang / btsog pa dang / ljan ljin

thams cad tshig par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni rlung chen po dang 'dra ste/ sme btsog thams cad bus par byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyi ma chen po dang 'dra ste/ mun nag yod do cog snang bar byed do/ /mdo sde 'di ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/ bzang ngan yod do cog thams cad shong bar byed do/ /de lta bu'i

theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di rgya che ba ni dpe zla med de/ yar byang chub sems dpa' dang / bar du nyan thos dang / mar 'jig tshogs kyi gzugs can no cog mi shong ba med do/ /de bas na khyed rnams kyis mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung ste/ chongs shig /kun tu spel bar

gyis shig /dad cing gus par byos shig dang / khyed byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon du mthong bar bya'o/ /khyed lha rnams kyang mdo sde 'di blangs te/ 'chang na rgyun du nga yang mthong la/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas

thams cad mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la zhugs par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad ces bya ba de 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos

nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams gsol zhing zhu ba zhig mchis na dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bshad par smon to/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/ shin tu legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu dri ba yod na ci 'dod pa bzhin dris shig dang / ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /khyod kyis dris pa de yang sems can dpag tu med

pa la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag dran pa sngon yun ring po 'das pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan rin chen gtsug phud ces bgyi ba de'i mtshan lan cig thos na lhar skye ba thob bo zhes

thos te/ de las yun mi ring ba zhig na rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul khams na dgon pa'i nang zhig la rdzing chen po zhig mchis pa'i chab skams nas de na nya chen po stong phrag bcu zhig mchis pa gdugs kyis gdungs te 'gum du nye ba las/ dra ma chu 'bebs zhes bgyi bas nya de dag mthong

nas sems can la shin tu byams pa dang / snying rje skyes te/ chab dang kha zas stsal kyang dgung 'ga' tsam zhig ni gson grang na/ tshe ring por mi thogs par 'tshal bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan lan gsum brjod pa nya de dag gis thos ma thag tu dus las 'das te/

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so zhes gda' na deng bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag dang / dus slad ma'i sems can rnams kyi slad du sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bstan cing bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i mtshan thos na tshad ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa'i skye bo la sman pa dang bde ba dang /

dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bsod nams dang / rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mngon sum du rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ sdom pa'i rtsa ba nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pas 'khrul pa'i sems can rnams yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i slad

du bshad par smon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu gal te ngas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya cher bshad na bskal pa brgya stong khri'i bar du bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ 'di ltar chu thams cad

kyi thigs pa ni bgrang zhing shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do/ /ri rab thams cad ni srang grangs su bgrang du rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do/ /nam mkha'i mtshams dang mtha' thug par shes par rung gi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

mtshan ni grangs su shes pa med do/ /ngas khyod la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan mdo tsam zhig bstan gyis gang gis rna bar lan gcig thos na gang zag de tshe 'phos ma thag tu lha'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thos nas kyang mos pa dang gus par byas te/ yi ger bris la mtshan nas brjod cing phyag

'tshal na bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig pa kun 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang zag de dus zad na yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur/ nga yang mthong la dus ma 'ongs pa na bskal pa bzang po'i

sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/ khyed rnams tshul bzhin du gos tshags bcos la/ lus mi g.yeng ba dang / sems mi g.yeng ba dang / dran pa mi g.yeng ba dang / rtog pa mi g.yeng bar byos la chos thos par

'dod na sems rtse gcig tu bsdus shig /bcom ldan 'das mar me ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sdud cing 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brjod dpag 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpe zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu med chos

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam khyab dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs la gnas pa'i stobs kyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig pa med pa'i stobs bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad 'dren pa'i ston pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'ching ba kun

gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten kun las 'das zin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgyud dang yongs su bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting nge 'dzin rnam par grol ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam mkha' ltar dmigs

su med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mang po'i nang na chos kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud bzhi'i tshogs 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bu gcig pa'i pha ltar byams pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe rabs 'chi 'phos gar 'byung gar skyes kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhal rtag tu mthong zhing sangs

rgyas kyi bdag nyid mngon par rtogs la mya ngan las 'das pa chen por phyin par gyur cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs can kun la sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro/ /kye 'khor mang po rnams sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyor la yang dag par mnyan cing sems thag pa nas mchod pa phul

cig /ngas ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas mtshan rnams bshad kyis nyon/ /sdig pa mtshams med lnga po yang / /rnam grol mtshan nyid bskyed par bya/ /dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag la/ /ngas ni dgrol zhing bshad kyis kyang / /des kyang chud par mi nus te/ /sa bon tshig

rnams rang bzhin dong / /grung brtan 'ba' zhig gnas par 'gyur/ /theg pa chung ngu bsal nas su/ /theg chen nyi tshe yod par 'gyur/ /theg pa gnyis po bsal nas su/ theg pa gcig pu yod par 'gyur/ /dge rtsa med pa'i gang zag gis/ /sgra 'di thos par mi 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas

grangs med mchod myong bas/ /gdod des sangs rgyas mtshan thos so/ /len cing 'dzin par byed pa ni/ /phyogs tsam rnam par grol ba ste/ /rnam dag sa la bde bar gnas/ /da yang nga yi chos 'di la/ /sangs rgyas spyad pa kun spyad de/ /sangs rgyas mtshan la phyag 'tshal zhing / /mdo 'di

blang zhing klog 'chang na/ /bdud kyi las dang bral bar 'gyur/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang mtshams med dang / /log spyod rnams kyi sdig kyang 'byang / /ma 'ongs dus na gang zag de/ /'phags pa'i lam yang nges par 'grub/ /gang zhig dad pa ma skyes na/ /ngan song gsum du ltung yang dag /dad skyes

brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal na/ /tshad med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas rtse gcig phyag 'tshal zhing / /sdig pa dpag med byang bar smon/ /de phyir gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'khor mang po rnams thal mo sbyar te/ yang dag par mnyan nas lus dang sems rtse gcig tu bsdus

te/ g.yel zhing 'gyur ba med par yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te sems thag pa nas mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsgrags pa las/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla mar me gsal nyi khri la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mar me mdzad sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thogs med ye shes mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgyal bu bcu drug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen mang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas sprin dbang mar me rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byin sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge bar bsams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku sprul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla gsal gyi dpal la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas pad ma dag pa rgyu skar rgyal po ye shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu btsun rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin 'brug sgra rgyu skar rgyal po ye

shes pa dam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shing sA la rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma dpal gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mi

g.yo 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od rgyang ring la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri legs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab lha'i thor tshugs can la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snyoms ri rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i dran pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chags med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas klu'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sa mi g.yo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya'i me tog mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya dang gser gyi kha dog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser

mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba'i gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas pad ma rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /sangs rgyas blo rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma sgyu ma dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yid skyo spangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

rin po che 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'dzugs phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab yon tan 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od sgrib la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla bai dUr+ya'i

'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bla med bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byang chub me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

me tog mdog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chu zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshom mun sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sdug bsngal bsgral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mos pa dang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sngon legs la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi shes rab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bzhad sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gnas la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zla

med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od 'bar rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od rgyun mi 'chad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od bsam dka' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od brjod med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan gser btso

ma'i mdog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ring du brtag pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbyangs dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zil dngar gyi ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i rgyal ba la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpal mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jam dpal ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje

rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog bla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jigs med stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu rje dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i gzi brjid rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug

rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu gtsang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos ta ma ra ba ra tsan dan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos tsan dan

'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dkon mchog brtsegs rab tu dga' ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas brtson 'grus chen po bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nor bu'i rgyal mtshan mar me'i 'od la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab sgron ma snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sra brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'od kun tu dgra ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas brtson 'grus che btsan la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' brtul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thugs rje stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'i snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi phug rnam par

bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bzang legs gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas legs par sad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgron chen 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i bla re stong pa nyid du brtags pa'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog gi 'od la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nam mkha'i rin chen me tog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku kun tu mngon par ston pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas bdud kyi rgyal po rnams tshar gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'i shes rab rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten dag pa'i 'od

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge dben zla ba'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog btsun ye shes rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gdugs rin po che'i rgyal por gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas klu'i rigs bla na med pa ye shes gtso bo'i

rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla nor bu'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes kyi ba dan mchog tu brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri med mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

'od snang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'bar ba'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser 'od snang ba'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra'i stobs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mchog dbyangs dam

pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ba dan 'od rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa'i mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi na bza'i rgyal po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi mtshan nyid dam pa'i

rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog su ma na'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog ud pa la'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas stobs btsan dam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab kyi stobs

kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga' 'khrug med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs dpag med rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blo gros 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi rgya mtsho'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

shes rab kyi ri dang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thar pa chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos thams cad rtag tu gang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas blun mi ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas

sprul pa'i sku thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig bgyis pa'i mi bzad pa thams cad 'byang bar
