'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gal te gang zag la las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas

grangs med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na de bskal pa khri phrag brgyad cu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung ste/ de bas na gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis sangs rgyas 'das pa'i mtshan/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /sems nyid thob cing sdig kyang

'byang / /mi dge bcu dang mtshams med lnga/ /phyin chad mi byed sdom par nus/ /dam pa'i chos ni rtag tu thos/ /theg chen tshul khrims ldan pa ste/ /de phyir de ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/ /rnam pa gnyis shig ma gtogs te/ /theg chen chos la dmod pa dang / /

log spyod phyogs su lta ba'o/ /gang zhig sems nyid rnam dag na/ /log spyod ces su mi bya ste/ /sangs rgyas dpag med rtag tu mthong / /sdig pa'i rtsa ba bzhi po dang / /mtshams med lngar bcas gang byas pa/ /rnam dag sems kyis 'gyod nus na/ /de ni tshul bzhin gnas pa

yin/ /de yang gus par phyag 'tshal phyir/ /mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing / /theg chen tshul khrims thob pas na/ /de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan de dag bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu mi skye ba'i chos la

bzod pa thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad brgyas ni theg pa chen po'i sems shes tsam skyes so/ /dge slong lnga stong ni dgra bcom par grub bo/ /lha dang mi khri phrag bcu zhig chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas gsal rgyal 'bum phrag bcu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i phye dri ma bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas snang ba dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas spos brtsegs la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge 'bum gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan kun tu 'od kyi ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bde gnas rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dka' thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs

rgyas rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dka' thub seng ge'i nga ro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'gyur la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas lding khang phyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba'i gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin

chen rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan dan me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tsan dan 'dab ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs

rgyas yid mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub zla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zil mngar rnga la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas nyi zla'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thub med 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas rnam par brgyan dang ldan pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer kun tu khyab pa'i yon tan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i seng ge'i sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer gtsang ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

gzungs rnam par rol pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dge mthong ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bla med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul

dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ma'i gzugs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs 'thor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bro mtshan med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas reg mtshan med la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shes rab ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i gzugs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas drin dpal kun tu

'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas yid sgra snyan sred la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i mtshan ma

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rtag tu zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang po'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ta ma ra bar tsan dan gyi spos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ri rab kyi gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprin dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten

gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la gus par phyag 'tshal na

bskal pa grangs med pa nas 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la las da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa'i mtshan thos na de ni bskal pa khri phrag drug cu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag

'tshal na/ /las ngan kun las rnam par grol/ /mtshams med lnga po'i sdig kyang 'byang / /rnam dag sa la rtag tu gnas/ /shAkya'i chos la'ang bde gnas shing / /mtha' ru ngan song gsum dang bral/ /sangs rgyas byams pa'ang mthong ba dang / /sangs rgyas stong yang

mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas da ltar phyag kyang 'tshal/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang mthong ste/ /rnam dag zhing du rtag par skye/ /dam pa'i chos kyang thos gyur cing / /sangs rgyas rtag pa'ang mngon par rtogs/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe chu bo

gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi sgor chud par gyur to/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas ma byon pa dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas byams pa

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam dag sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ming dang mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas

'dzam bu na da'i gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas khyab snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas shes rab ri dang rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dbang phyug thob pa'i

rgyal po 'bum phrag brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mthong dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyi mtshan mas rnam par brgyan pa'i rgyal po nyi khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtshan 'thun pa kun tu

dpal sum khri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur bzhi khri brgyad stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas zla ba rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs

rgyas gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gzugs dam pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bgegs kyi tshogs thams cad bcom pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dri'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sgra'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa stong phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par bkod pa 'bum phrag brgyad cu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i me tog rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mchog gi rgyal po la phyag

'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser btso ma'i 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas lung bstan pa pad+ma'i 'od lnga brgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'jigs sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas me tog bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

sangs rgyas rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig /sangs rgyas bcu/ sangs rgyas brgya/ sangs rgyas stong / sangs rgyas khri la phyag 'tshal na/ bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa'i 'khor ba nas sdig lci ba rnams

'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i bye ma snyed dpag tu med/ grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gang zag gang la las thos par gyur na bskal pa khri phrag bzhi bcu'i bar

du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ de bas da ltar phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas ma byon rnams/ /de la gus par phyag 'tshal na/ /log spyod rnams ni ma gtogs te/ /sgrib pa gsum dang mtshams med lnga/ /sdig pa de rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas

chos la bde gnas shing / /dpag med sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos kyang rtag tu thos/ /de bas da ltar gus phyag 'tshal/ /gang zhig phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal na/ /kha na ma tho 'das pa dang / /

ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi/ /las ngan bcu po byas pa yang / /da ltar mngon du byang bar 'gyur/ /phyi ma'i dus la sangs rgyas kyi/ /ngo bo nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ /de bas de la mos par byos/ /kha ton 'dri klog phyag 'tshal na/ /tshe rabs gar byung gar skyes kyang / /

lta ba log par mi skye'o/ /rnam par grol pa rgyun tu thob/ /mtha' 'khob sa ru yong mi skye/ /ngan pa'i yul du'ang mi skye zhing / /rgyal po ma rungs mthong mi 'gyur/ /bskal pa 'bum phrag bzhi khri'i bar/ /sems can dmyal bar mi skye'o/ /de bas gus par phyag 'tshal

na/ /mi dge bcu yi las 'byang zhing / /gzungs chen rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas ma byon pa rnams kyi mtshan bsgrags pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lnga khris phyir mi ldog pa'i sar gnas so/ /dge slong ma bdun brgyas ni dgra bcom mar

grub bo/ /lha dang mi 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /gzungs chen po dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gling gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmad du byung ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /theg pa chen po'i sde snod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan thos na

bstod pa byas sam/ phyag 'tshal lam/ brjod dam/ mos pa bskyed dam/ blangs sam/ 'chang bar byed na gang zag de bskal pa khri phrag nyi shu'i bar du sems can dmyal bar mi ltung ste/ tshe snga phyi dran pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir gus pas phyag 'tshol cig /

bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri lnga stong gis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /nyan thos 'bum phrag bcus theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /dge slong dang / dge slong ma stong phrag bcus dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /

lha dang mi dpag tu med pa zhig gis chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob bo/ /phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyun mi gtong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpa' brtson la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla gang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stobs dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dren mkhan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'chad mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' klu'i sdong po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan rin po che'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

spyod pa rnam par bkod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzungs 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sred med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag par gus la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi rgyal po'i me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yon tan gyi stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyan rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam legs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od

gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi gzugs brnyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'gog spyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' rnam grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyam mi mnyam rtog la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi mtshan nyid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyis brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyan chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun tu bteg la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag rgyun tu phab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtse ba can la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rin chen sgron ma 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blta ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dra ba snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' skyon med rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud rnam

par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbang phyug rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi mtshan gyis rnam par brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

seng ge sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' btang bzung ri bsgul ba'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po che dkar po la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dbyug pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

sgra thub med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhing gi rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi gtsug pud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu brgyan pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang shar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dka' rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tsan dan gyi me tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi gtsug tor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi dge ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpung mchog la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsang shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' legs ldan sred

med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' glog gi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

mthong na dga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i yid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab zab mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thogs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi zhing la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i rgyan la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor bu'i gtsug tor gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bden mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab mthong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po zab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po me

tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dri mkhas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lan ldon mkhas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid mngon du rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nges par brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems

dpa' bdud skrag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyabs mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab go 'phang 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dmigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab smon lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba rnam bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbyangs ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mchog la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos dga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

dbang phyug chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan tshal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i dbyangs la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgra mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kha dog dam pa'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa sna tshogs brgyan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' spyi bo skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba brtsegs la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtso mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus kun tu mngon par ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sku mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dri med

mdzod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsun dpal gyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bai dUr+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od

rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rten pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu phan gdags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' kun tu bzung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' log par

dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od chub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ston pa'i mkhan po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' me tog brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab

rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya'i rigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' rtag tu snying rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi dbyig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab ri la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' snang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri ngar can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rtse la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang

chub sems dpa' ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' char pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'brug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo rin po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'tsher la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

rin chen snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mi 'gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i phyag rgya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i dkyil 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i rgyan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' rin chen chu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen byed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' chos mos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po rnam dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gtsug tor gyi mtshan ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i

thor tshugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'od stong la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo rig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'

zla 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sbyin brtag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' snang khyab la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mnyen pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma'i 'od la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gtsang ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems

dpa' 'od 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dpal btsun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho rgya che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yul rnam par rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub

sems dpa' shes rab gsal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' yon tan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' snang thar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu sbyin la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gzugs stobs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dul ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' lus sbed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' gcig dang / bcu dang / brgya dang / stong dang / khri la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag brgya/ khri phrag nyis brgya/ khri phrag sum brgya/ khri phrag bzhi brgya/ khri phrag lnga brgya/ khri phrag drug brgya/ khri phrag bdun brgya/ khri phrag brgyad brgya/ khri phrag dgu brgya/ khri phrag stong rnams la phyag

'tshal na bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag gcig /'bum phrag bcu/ 'bum phrag brgya/ 'bum phrag stong / 'bum phrag khri/ 'bum phrag khri phrag khri la phyag 'tshal na

bskal pa dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig pa mi zad pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gA gcig gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA

bzhi'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA lnga'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA drug gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA brgyad kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA dgu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA

bcu'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA brgya'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA stong gi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA khri'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gA bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du ma'i bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal na bskal pa

grangs med dpag tu med pa tshun chad kyi 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshan 'di dag thos na bskal pa stong phrag bzhi bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal du mi ltung zhing srid pa

gsum gyi khams su mi gtogs te/ rtag tu rnam par grol ba'i khams su gtogs par 'gyur ro/ /mtha' 'khob tu mi skye/ yul ngan par mi skye/ lus ngan pa mi len/ log par mi lta/ /rigs ngan du mi skye/ mu stegs can du mi skye/ dbang po yan lag

tshang bar 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos rtag tu thos par 'gyur/ sdom pa'i tshul khrims ma mnos kyang khrims dang rtag tu ldan par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po spyod lam mdzes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur/ de bas gus par phyag 'tshal te/ sangs

rgyas kyi chos la bden par gnas shing phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi mtshan bshad pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /

lha 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /dge slong sems stor ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad kyis ni sems kyi bdag nyid slar rnyed de dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag bcus ni gzungs chen po thob ste/ ma 'ongs

pa'i dus na mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan nyid dad la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba de'i mtshan sems can sdug bsngal

gyis gzir ba can rnams kyis lan cig thos na 'chi 'phos pa'i tshe lhar skye'o zhes khyod nyid kyis bshad pa dang / de yang nga la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan bshad par gsol zhing sems can kun sdug bsngal dang bral zhing 'jig rten las bzla bar 'dod pa de'i phyir ngas kyang khyod dang skye bo

kun la dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan rdzogs par bshad kyis kyang / don dam par na dkon mchog gcig la bkri ba'i dbang gis gsum du bshad pa gang la las de'i mtshan thos nas sems thag pa nas dran par byas te/ 'chi kar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'ga' zhig gis dkon mchog

gsum gyi mtshan lan gsum du/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+ha rmA ya/ namaHsaM g+hA ya zhes de skad du ched du brjod du bcug na mi 'di 'chi 'phos nas ngan song gsum du mi 'gro ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang nas gang du dad pa de dang der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams

cad la mthar gyis rim gro byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal dang kun tu bzang pos theg pa chen po'i chos thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur/ thos nas kyang de ma thag tu skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa

thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu gang zag de yang bskal pa grangs med pa nas dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bstsags pas gdod dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan thos pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum zhes bgyi/ dngos po gcig gam/ dngos po gnyis sam/ dngos po gsum du bgyi/ ci ste dngos po gcig na ni skyabs gcig tu song bas/ dngos po gsum lags na ni skyabs gsum du gyur pas skyabs gsum

du gyur na ni sangs rgyas dang chos kyang dbyings tha dad par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun yang de bzhin no/ /gal te skyabs gsum zhig lags na ni skye bo rnams rnam pa gsum du mthong bas bskal pa gsum gyi bar du chos spyod kyang theg pa gcig tu brda mi 'jal bar mchi na/ bcom ldan

'das sems can rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bdag la bshad du gsol/ bdag 'di thos nas kyang skye bo kun la bye brag phyed par bshad par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na gang la las mtshan thos na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gnas thob par yang

'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /don chen po 'di lta bu nga la zhu bar nus pa ni shin tu'ang legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta bu'i don chen po

'dri ba yang sa dang po dang / sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa la gnas pa ma yin te/ sa bcu chos kyi sprin la gnas pa'i skyes bu chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa la don chen po 'di lta bu 'dri ba yin no/ /khyod legs par nyon cig /ngas bye brag

phyed par bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu skye bo thams cad ni thog ma med pa nas ma rig pas bsgribs te/ khams gsum gyi btson ra na 'khor zhing sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gzir te/ lam rgyud drug tu phan tshun rnam par rgyu ba la skyabs dang rten pa'i gnas med nas lha ma srin la phyogs

te skyabs tshol ba/ mu stegs rnams rang gi rkang lag bcings shing srog btang ste/ skyabs tshol na yang sdug bsngal las thar pa med do/ /me dang mtsho'i nang du mchongs te srog btang yang 'khor ba las thar pa'i dus med de/ de'i phyir mgon po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas

byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis skye bo rgyun tu 'khrul pa rnams la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan bstan cing yang dag pa'i rten gnas su bya ba'i phyir/ bslab pa dang po pa nyan thos dang rang byang chub pa rnams la them skas dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum

yang dngos po tha dad par bshad do/ /de'i 'og tu rgyun ring du tshangs par spyod pa'i skyes bu dam pa la yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum dngos po gcig par yang bshad de/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig gi nang na chos dang dge 'dun gyi dkon mchog kyang yod par

bshad do/ /rigs kyi bu ci'i phyir dkon mchog ces bya zhe na/ dper na 'jig rten gyi rin po che sna bdun pos phongs pa rnams la 'tsho ba bstangs pa dang 'dra bar dkon mchog gsum yang 'jig rten na skye bo rnams kyi chos kyi sku bskyed pa dang / ye shes spel bar byed pas dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /dkon

mchog gsum dngos po tha dad pa ni sangs rgyas rgyal po'i khab tu sku sprul cing byang chub sems dpa' yin pa skad du sems can bsgral ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dang dka' thub spyad de/ byang chub kyi shing drung du mngon par byang chub nas bdag dang gzhan gyi don mdzad ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /

sangs rgyas ni ma rig pa'i gnyid las sad pa'o/ /dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni mchod pa'i gnas so/ /ston pa las slob mas don rnyed pa'i phyir dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /dge 'dun la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'thun pa dang / 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas pa thob pa ni yang dag pa'i

stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid grol ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'khrul pa bar mi chad par 'byung ba'i zag pa zad pa yang 'dus ma byas zhes bya'o/ /zag pa thams cad 'gags nas 'phags pa rnams dang gnas gcig tu 'thun te/ rtsod pa med pa ni 'thun pa ste/

don de gnyis dang ldan pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu chos ni dge sdig gi chos thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas rnams so/ /sdig pa'i chos ni spang bar bya/ dge ba'i chos ni 'phel bar bya'o/ /de yang sems kyis dmigs so cog chos kyi dkon

mchog ces bya'o/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun gnyis dngos po yang mi gcig la/ ngo bo nyid kyang tha dad do/ /chos ni dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas su dbyings 'thun te so sor dbye bar dka'o/ /ji ltar so sor dbye bar dka' zhe na/ /gal te sangs rgyas dang dge

'dun gnyis kyi mtshan su btags te/ rnam par dpyod pa bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po thob pa dang / dge ba'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go zhes bya bar don de lta bu yang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i yon tan dang bsod nams kyi dbang gis mi

lus thob pa yin no/ /chos dang bral na mi med la/ mi las gud na yang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba ga la yod/ /deng 'dir gleng ba ni mi dang chos su gcig tu 'thun la tha dad pa yang yod de/ chos kyi dbang gis mir grub/ mi'i dbang du chos 'gro bas de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i

phung po dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te/ ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do/ /nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni dge 'dun

dkon mchog tu bshad do/ /yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / gtan tshigs su dmigs pa'i sbyor ba ni chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /ye ni dbyings gcig ste/ don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge

'dun tha dad pa yang yod de/ de yang chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o/ /de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad nas/ sems can gyi skyabs dang rten du bya na/ khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /spyod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sbom po las thar gyis kyang

sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad de/ de'i phyir yang dag pa mthar phyin pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o/ /sngon bshad pa la sangs rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o/ /chos ni mi rtag go/ /dge 'dun yang mi rtag ste/ sdug bsngal yin pas yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin zhes zer na

deng 'dir bshad pa ni rtag tu gnas pa ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa pa rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing / phyin ci log brgyad dang bral ba/ skye 'gag med pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cog dmigs

pa'i mthar phyin par spyad pa ni yang dag pa'i chos dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /spyod pa pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i chos kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o/ /yang phyin ci log brgyad gtan du bral bas 'phags pa dang skye bo

thams cad 'thun zhing nam du yang rtsod pa med pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o/ /sngon dkon mchog gsum mi dang chos su tha dad par bshad/ deng 'dir ni sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang dge 'dun yang der byung bas don de'i phyir ngas khyod la dngos po gcig pa'i dkon mchog

gsum bshad de/ skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang la rnam par rtog ste theg pa chen po bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khams gsum mi rtag par bsams te theg pa chen por bsgrub bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis gsol pa/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ mi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te yang

dag pa'i dran pa mngon du bzhag la byams pa dang snying rje thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bsgral na yang lan mi re ba ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de ltar sems can yongs su mi gtong bar theg pa chen po bsgrub par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu dper na grong khyer chen po

gcig 'khor rgya dpag tshad gcig la/ sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gror ni lam na g.yang sa dang / mun nag pa dang / shin tu 'jigs pa'i sa cher yod kyis kyang / grong khyer der phyin na shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas skyes bu mi gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa shin tu yang sdug mod

kyi/ grong khyer de na bde skyid pa'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa yod do zhes thos pas bu sdug pa der bor nas/ grong khyer der 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyis lam 'jigs sa bsgral nas grong khyer de'i sgor phyin pa dang / rkang pa ya gcig nang du bcug ste/ rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg

pa'i bar du bu de dran nas 'di ltar bsams so/ /bdag la bu gcig pu yod pa bdag chas pa'i khar ci ste ma khrid/ da su zhig slad na gso zhig gu zhes bsams nas grong khyer de btang ste slar bu'i thad du chas so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang snying rje yang de dang 'dra ste/

byams shing snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga sgom par byed do/ /bsgoms te zag pa zad na yang mi shes grub pa mi len te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir zag pa zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa spong ste/ so so'i skye bo'i sar bgrod par byed do/ /rigs kyi

bu dper grong khyer bde skyid pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa chen po la bya'o/ /dper sgo mang po zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong la bya'o/ /dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni bdud dang bgegs lta bu la bya'o/ /dper grong khyer gyi sgor phyin zhes bya ba ni mngon

par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o/ /dper rkang pa ya gcig bteg ste them pa'i nang du 'jug pa ni ye shes la bya'o/ /dper rkang pa ya gcig ma bteg pa ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnam par ma grol ba la bya'o/ /dper bu gcig pu lus zhes smra ba ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la

bya'o/ /dper bu la dran pa ni snying rje chen po la bya'o/ /dper bu'i thad du ldog pa ni sems can 'dul zhing rnam par grol ba thob par byed pa la bya'o/ /dper lan dang 'grub pa mi len pa ni thabs mkhas pa la bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa

chen po dang snying rje chen pos bsdus te/ mi gtong ba ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa dang po sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sems can la rtag tu dge ba bcu dpog par bya'o/ /bcu po gang

zhe na/ srog mi gcod pa dang / ma byin par mi len pa dang / 'dod pas log par mi g.yem pa dang / du mi smra ba dang / phra ma dang dbyen mi byed pa dang / ngag rtsub po mi smra ba dang / don med pa'i gtam tshig kyal pa mi smra ba dang / brnab sems mi byed pa

dang / gnod sems mi byed pa dang / log par mi lta ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang / snying rje phun sum tshogs par spyad na byams pas ni dge ba ston cing bde ba la 'god par byed/ snying rjes ni sdug bsngal las thar ba dang / dmyal ba

las sgrol bar byed do/ /skye bo rnams mya ngan las 'da' bar bsgrub 'dod pa'i sgo ma shes pa mthong na byang chub sems dpas skye bo de dag la snying rje ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /snying rje ba'i dbang gis sems can thams cad la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon

par ston te/ theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bgyi ba gang / bka'

stsal pa/ mi skye mi 'gag pa'i chos spyad pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos mi skye ba ni gang / mi 'gag pa ni gang / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sdig pa'i chos ni mi skye bar bya/ dge ba'i chos ni mi 'gag par bya'o/ /de lta bu'i spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi

dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu khams gsum na bgrod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na chos rnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du bgrod par bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi tshig dang / yi ge'i rjes su khams gsum yod par bshad mod kyi/ bla na med pa'i byang chub ni dus gsum du mi gnas

la mthar phyin pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su mi ltung na dus gsum dang khams gsum lta ci smos/ chos bcu po gang zhe na/ stod pa dang smad pa la sems skyed bri med pa dang / snyan pa dang mi snyan par thos pa la sems rnam par mi rtog pa dang / shes rab can dang / gti mug can la 'dra bar snying rje

bskyed pa dang / sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste/ snyoms par lta ba dang / mchod pa gus ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang / gzhan gyi nyes skyon la 'phyas mi 'dogs pa dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na yang theg pa gcig tu lta ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi

sgra thos na yang 'jigs pa dang skrag pa'i sems mi skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang / bskal pa snyigs ma can gyi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa dang bcu ste/ chos bcu po de dag dang

ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa khams gsum na bgrod pa'i tshe snying rje chen pos gzhi byas na mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rdul mi gcig ste/ de bas na bsam gyis khyab dka' zhes bya'o/ /

gang zhig 'jig rten rnam dag na/ /bskal pa gcig gi bar dag tu/ /tshul khrims dam du bsrung ba ni/ /skyes bu de ni skad cig tsam/ /byams pa spyad pas dam pa mchog /gang zhig 'jig rten 'di ru ni/ /lus dang ngag yid sdig spyad de/ /ngan song

gsum du ltung nges dag /byams sems de yis 'phral du 'byang / /byang chub sems dpa' 'ga' zhig gis/ /'jig rten ngan par skyes na yang / /'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyed cig /ngan song ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang / /mgo bo na ba tsam gyis 'byang / /

gang zhig 'ching ba gcod 'dod dam/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa spang 'dod pa/ /'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang / /dam chos bsrung bas shes rab 'phel/ /rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum/ /tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas/ /deng nas sang gi bar dag tu/ /

'jig rten 'di na gnas kyang sla/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas ni mi 'khrugs 'jig rten dang / /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gnyis/ /shin tu rnam dag mthong ba na/ /sdug bsngal bya ba'i ming yang med/ /khams der bsod nams bya ba ni/ /dka' ba snyam du mi mdzad do/ /

gang zhig 'jig rten 'di dag tu/ /rang gis mi bzod bzod bya ste/ /pha rol po yang bzod bcug na/ /de ni bsod nams dam pa mchog /de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jig rten ngan 'dir bgrod pa'i tshe/ /nyon mongs mya ngan ma byed par/ /sems can

thams cad 'dren bya ste/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na/ /bla med byang chub myur du thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis deng 'dir byang

chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi rgyu dang rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis na/ de bzhin gshegs pas skabs dbye bar gnang na spobs pa bskyed de zhu bar bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod sngon sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba

rnams bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs spyad pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir byang chub spyod pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pa 'dri ba legs kyis 'dod pa bzhin dris shig /ngas khyod la bye phrag phyed par bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye

bar gnang nas bcom ldan 'das la nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems la gdung ba ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na nges pa'i tshig la 'gyod pa ma

mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na 'jigs pa ma mchis shing tshul mi g.yo bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'grub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems

dpas ci bgyis na sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par 'tshal bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sems can gyi ston pa bgyid par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshe tshe rabs rabs su

byang chub kyi sems chud mi gzon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sems spyod pa rnams gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na chos rin po ches legs par sgrub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshul khrims

dang 'dul ba las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na tshogs mang po kun dang 'thun par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par

'byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi stor bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag mi lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na bsam gtan

dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas ci bgyis na dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang / khams gsum du bgrod cing sems can la ston pa bgyid de/ sangs

rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid bar mi 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes bgyis pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams zhu nus pa yang shin tu legs so legs so/ /khyod legs

par nyon la dran pa mngon du zhog shig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin du thos par smon te/ mnyan cing mnos par 'tshal lo zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems

dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyis sems mi gdung bar 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la snying rje cher bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus bskyed cing le lo mi byed pa dang / skye shi'i 'khor ba rmi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang / yang

dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bsam pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyis sems gdung ba med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na nges pa'i tshig la bar ma dor 'gyod par mi

'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag med par mngon par chud ces brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so cog la dad pa'i 'du shes bskyed pa mi rigs zhes brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyun du bsngags pa brjod pa dang / nges

pa'i tshig gis las dge sdig gi 'bras bu mi rlag ces brjod pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / mang du thos pa dang / sbyin pa byin pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang bzhi

'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jigs pa med cing tshul las mi g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ khe stor ba dang mi snyan par grags pa dang / smad cing sma dbab pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis non kyang mi g.yo ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi

dang ldan na chos dkar po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po la las dge sdig yid ches par ston pa dang / sbyin pa la lan mi re ba dang / dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing skyong ba dang / shes rab chen pos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rigs

kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar du legs par shes par 'gyur ro/ /chos bzhi gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yun du bskyed pa dang / nyes skyon thams cad sel ba dang / thabs la shin tu mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang

chub tu bsngo ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na thabs la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can gyi yid dang 'thun par byed pa dang / gzhan gyi bsod nams dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i sems skyed pa dang / sdig yod na

'gyod tshangs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba 'debs pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sems can gyi ston pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang bde ba sgrub

par byed pa dang / rang gi dga' ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / mnyen des byas te bzod pa bsgom pa dang le lo spong ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe tshe rabs rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud mi zos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas

thams cad rtag tu dran par byed pa dang / bsod nams byas so cog sems can gyi phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang / theg pa chen po yongs su sgrog par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sems spyod pa

rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su mi spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems spang ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems spang ba dang / chos sgrub pas skyo mi ngas pa dang / chos ci thos pa gzhan la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi

dang ldan na chos rin po che legs par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ theg pa chen po chos dkon pa'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang theg pa chen po'i chos sems kyi nad thams cad sel ba'i phyir sman dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang mi rlag pa'i phyir

nor gyi dbyig dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal 'gog par lta ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshul khrims nyams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/

chos rnams 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams song ba med pa'i phyir chos la mi 'gog pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang / chos rnams rgyu dang rkyen las skye bar shes pa'i phyir chos la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bzod pa thob pa dang / tha dad pa'i sems

rgyud med pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i bzod pa thob pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du gzhag pa dang / dbang po rnams bsdam pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi

stobs bskyed nus pa dang / dben pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'dzi spang bar bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na tshogs mang po kun dang 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag chos sgrub na yang khyad par thob par mi sgrub pa dang /

le lo med par rtag tu bkur sti dang gus pa'i sems skyed pa dang / chos kyi phan pa 'ba' zhig tshol gyi bdag mi spyom pa dang / gzhan la dge ba'i chos bstan kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / grags pa mi tshol ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na

chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung zhing skyong ba dang / rang gi shes rab la phan par byed cing gzhan la ston par byed pa dang / rtag tu ya rabs kyi chos spyod pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / ma dag pa'i chos la mi rtog pa

dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i rtsa ba mi rlag par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol po'i nyes skyon la dbang mi bza' ba dang / zhe sdang can la rtag tu byams sems bsgom pa dang / rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du

bshad pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na gzhan gyis bstan pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pa gzhan la sbyin pa dang /

gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba mi brjod pa dang / chos kyis bsdus te sems can gyi ston pa la mkhas pa dang / chos zab mo chub par shes pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin btang ste 'dod pa'i khams su mngon du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /

bzhi gang zhe na/ sems mnyen des su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu rnyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad mi gtong ba dang / shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun du sgom nus pa dang bzhi'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ skye shi'i 'khor ba grangs med par myong na yang skyo ba'i sems mi bskyed pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / byams sems tshad med pa bsgom par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshad med pa la mos

pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' yang chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir smon lam mi gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i spyod lam la dad pa dang / brtson 'grus chen po la 'dun

pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mos rgyun du spyod pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod cing spyod pa rnam pa bzhi po'i rnam grangs spyad de/ sems can la phan pa dang bde bar byas shing 'jig rten las bzla bar bsgoms na sangs rgyas

kyi bdag nyid rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe theg pa chen po'i chos rnam pa bzhi bzhir bshad pa'i tshe na lha bzhi khris ni bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /mi las nyi khri lnga stong ni chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri brgyad stong ni chos kyi

khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par chud do/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di legs par

zung shig /chongs shig ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di'i ming ni thar pa chen po phyogs su

rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'joms pa/ mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas par gzhig pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ log par lta ba dang / 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching ba 'grol ba/ khams gsum gyi btson ra 'dral ba/ 'khor ba las thar cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su

sgrol ba/ sa bon dam pa'i rgyu skams pa rlan par byed pa/ rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos kyi char 'bebs pa/ sems can theg pa gsum gyi myu gu dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub kyi 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes

bya bar zung shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyan snga dang / 'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / tshogs dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang

du chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang / don rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar rmad

du byung ba'i theg pa chen po de lta bu ni thos ma myong ste/ deng thos pa 'di da bdag gis rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag la chos dang dge 'dun ni 'gag par mi 'gyur te/ khams gsum gyi sems can rang skye zhing rang 'gag par gyur

nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis khams gsum du bgrod cing so so'i skye bo'i rjes su snyegs te/ mya ngan las 'da'o

zhes su brjod pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ bdag cag rnams kyis theg pa brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu chen po'i chos kyi sku thob par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems

can rnams la mdo sde 'di spel bar bgyi'o/ /gzung zhing 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bshad pa bzhin bsgom ste/ dus gcig tu sangs rgyas su 'grub par bgyi'o/ /mi gtong bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu

dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na snyigs ma can gyi dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs su bzung zhing klog gam/ kha ton du bgyid dam/ glegs bam du yi ger 'dri'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na bsod nams ji tsam zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang la las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas mdo sde 'di'i ming tsam thos pas bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /gang la las 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag

bcu nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /gang la las phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas theg pa chen po phyogs

su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nang na yi ge 'bru gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig gam/ shu log gcig 'dri'am/ 'drir 'jug na de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu med par che'o/ /'jig rten grangs med pa'i khams su rin po ches yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas kyang sems thag pa

nas mdo sde 'di shu log gcig klog gam/ kha ton du byas na bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o/ /stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi skyabs byin pa bas kyang / gang gis sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di'i don tshig gcig shes te/ gzhan la

tshig gcig gam/ shu log gcig gi don bstan na bsod nams de bas kyang dpag tu med par che'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni nyan thos kyi sbyin pa yin te/ tshe dang longs spyod bskyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las mi thar ro/ /theg pa chen po chos kyi sbyin pa ni sems can

rnams kyi byang chub kyi rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni sngon sdig can ma rungs pa yin na yang da dge ba dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon sdug bsngal can yin na yang da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon 'ching

ba can yin na yang dgrol thar pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon ma rgal ba yin na yang da rgal ba can no/ /sngon blun pa zhig yin na yang da ni slob dpon du chud pa'o/ /sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na yang da ni zag pa med pa'o/ /sngon so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin na yang da ni

'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa'o/ /sngon chos lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na yang da ni 'phags pa'i lam la chud pa'o/ /lus skye bo'i lus can yin na yang mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir blo ni 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'dra ba'o/ /sngon nyon mongs pa can zhig yin na yang da mdo sde

'di klog pa dang 'chang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no zhes bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa ltar na/ sngon so so'i skye bo

lags kyang da ni 'phags pa'i spyod pa dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba dang / sngon nyon mongs pa can lags na yang da ni mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mya ngan las 'da' ba can no/ /zhes byung na tshul khrims zhig pa dang / mtshams ma mchis

par spyad pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yang ci mdo sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste/ mya ngan las 'da' ba dang 'thun pa zhig lags sam/ don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bye brag phyed par bstan du gsol zhes bgyis

pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis legs par zhus pas ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir log par lta ba dang / tshul khrims

nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa yong med do/ /de ji lta zhe na/ dper na dra ma mi gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa de shin tu'ang phangs shing sdug

na pha yod pa'i tshe na ni nyin mtshan du bstan cing bslabs pas byas so cog la 'gal ba med/ bu yang pha la sri zhu che ste/ pha'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yong ma byung ngo / /re shig dus gcig na pha lam ring por 'dron du song ba las ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i bar du bu de pha'i bstan ngag

brjed nas nyes pa yang mang du byung ngo / /pha ring du lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i phyir pha shi ba skad du brjod de ngud mo dag byed cing khad kyis 'chal du byed do/ /mya ngan gyis non te sems stor nas phas bstan pa yang brjed de chos la skur pa dang 'dra bar 'gal ba sha stag byed do/ /pha de yun ring mo zhig

lon nas dus gcig na slar khyim du log pa'i tshe bu yang shin tu dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pha'i bstan ngag kyang dran te gzungs su bzung nas nyes pa yang ma byung ngo / /pha mthong ba'i phyir pha ma shi bar yang yid ches nas log par ltung ba can zhes kyang mi bya'o/ /pha'i bka' bzhin du mi 'gal

bar spyad pas skur pa can zhes kyang mi bya ste/ rigs kyi bu dra ma zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /bu gcig pu zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad do/ /phas bstan cing bslabs zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims so/ /lam ring por song zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi

'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o/ /pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni tshe 'das so zhes brjod pa'o/ /mya ngan gyis non pa ni sgrib pas bsgribs pa'o/ /gzungs su mi 'dzin pa ni tshul khrims zhig pa'o/ /shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig spyod pa'o/ /don 'khrul pa'i phyir skur pa btab pa'o/ /

de bzhin gshegs pas khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te/ sems can gyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyis chos bstan nas sems kyi rang bzhin slar rnyed pas tshul khrims mi nyams pa'o/ /mya ngan las mi 'da' bar yid

ches pa ni ltung ba med pa'o/ /bstan pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod cing don shes pa ni chos la mi skur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang 'chang ba ni 'khor ba grangs med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i sdig lci ba kun 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang mdo sde 'di thos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'o/ /

gang mdo sde 'di mthong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ba'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzin pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di bshad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o/ /gang mdo sde 'di'i don

shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi don shes pa'o/ /gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi don legs par khrol ba de ni nyon mongs pa gtan med par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu bskal

pa brgyad khri la nyin zhag gcig tu brtsi ba/ zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig /zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang phrad do/ /yang bskal pa grangs de dang 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang

phrad pa bas kyang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa shin tu dkon no/ /gang mdo sde 'di dang phrad pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang phrad pa dang 'dra'o/ /de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / yi ger

'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la yang bstan na log par lta ba dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu med pa yang 'ju bar

'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon 'ju ba skad mi gda' na so so'i skye bo lta zhig yon 'ju bar 'gyur ram/ zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang sangs rgyas

yon mi 'ju mi srid de/ sems can la chos bshad cing bsgral mi nus na yang bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul cing sems can rnams sgrol bar byed pas mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub

sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mdo sde kha cig las 'byung ba lta ba log pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa rnams dang / khams gcig tu lhan cig gnas su yang mi rung ba dang / chu klung gcig la chab 'tshal du yang mi rung ngo zhes 'byung la

gso sbyong gi tshe gang zag de 'phags pa'i lam stor ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi nang du'ang mi chud ces 'byung na ci'i slad du deng 'dir tshul khrims zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur zhes gsungs/ gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha mi dad

la/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra na/ bcom ldan 'das de tsam zhig bye brag phyed par bshad par smon/ bdag kyang de thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstan par bgyi'o/ /rnam par dgrol bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems

dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyed la sogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang / snying rje phun sum tshogs par ldan pas sems can rnams la snying brtse bar bsams te/ don de zhu ba ni rab tu'ang legs te ngas kyang bye brag phyed par bshad kyis

legs par soms la nyon cig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i spyod yul ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig par yang mi 'gyur la/ bdud dang / mu stegs dang / so so'i skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/ de ni sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud par

zad do/ /rigs kyi bu ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan pa/ sems can bzang ngan rnam par mi rtog par sbyin pa byas na bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub po zhes bshad de/ byol song la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan thob par 'gyur ro/ /

log spyod la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan lan stong thob par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyun chad pa ni 'chi 'phos nas log spyod kyi rgyud du 'gro'o/ /drin gzo ba dang khrel med pa ni byol song gi brgyud du 'gro'o/ log spyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin

pa yang bsod nams can gyi yon 'ju na mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba'i gang zag lta zhig ci smos/ de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po'i phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin ni bsam gyi mi khyab bo/ /tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba

dang / dam pa'i chos la bkur ba dang / log par blta ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas na mchod yon yang 'ju bar nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bde bzhin

gshegs pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab/ thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu dang byin yang bsam gyi mi khyab/ mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /rigs kyi

bu de de bzhin no/ /khyed kyi bshad pa bzhin te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems pa nam mkha'i snying po la de skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ngas dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam

par dag pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na yang nyan thos kyi tshul du spyad pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu med pa dag byung ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la

lung bstan par ma gyur to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas bskal pa mthong bar mos pa zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas kyang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes

bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen

bkur byas na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan to/ /bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sdug bsngal skyabs zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar

gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas nas gdod mdo sde 'di'i ming

thos te/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs kyis kyang mdo sde 'di da dung ma mthong ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs bstsags te/ mchod pa phul na yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstan par ma gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu nga sngon bskal

pa de snyed du sangs rgyas de snyed la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang bstod pa byas nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te/ nyan thos kyi sdom pa dang / tshul phun sum tshogs pa tshangs par spyad cing sbyin pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bslab pa dang nga rgyal dang / zhe sdang dang / gti

mug spangs te/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan spyad pa dang / bzod pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang / ji ltar thos pa bzhin brtson 'grus su bshad pa dang / thos so cog thams cad mi brjed pa dang / 'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas pa dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /

bsam gtan las byung nas chos nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / bsam pa la sogs pa byas kyang rgyal ba de dag gis nga la lung ma bstan ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdom pa mnos so cog 'jig pa dang / nyams pa mang du byung ba'i phyir ro/ /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro/ /theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa 'di ma thos pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su

rgyas pa bsgom par byas na lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gal te ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na yang rdzogs par mi nus te/ rigs kyi bu nga bskal pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis tshogs chen po

dpag tu med pa la theg pa chen po'i mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa der mthong nas nga de'i tshe de'i dus na gdod thos pa dang mthong bar gyur to/ /rgyal ba de las blangs te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / don bsam pa la sogs pa byas nas

de ma thag tu chos la mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyis nga la lung bstan pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu chos

kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs te/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa la sogs pa byas na sangs rgyas kyis yang myur du thob par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten na lha dang mir bcas pa'i mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir ngas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin

po che'i snying po dang 'dra ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / dbul phongs pa rnams kyi tshul dang rin po che'i nor bu sbyin par byed pa la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /theg chen dpe tshad rgya mtsho bzhin/ /theg pa chung ngu ba rjes chu/ /theg chen dpe tshad ri rab lhun/ /

theg pa chung ngu grog ma'i mkhar/ /theg chen dpe tshad nyi zla bzhin/ /theg pa chung ngu me stag tsam/ /theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab theg pa'o/ /dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba/ /sems can thams cad go 'byed do/ /theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / /theg pa 'di las 'da' ba

med/ /theg pa chen po 'di nang nas/ /theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung / /dpag pa'i grangs shig yod na ni/ /thams cad bsgral bar mi nus so/ /theg pa bla na med pa 'di/ /sems can yongs su bsgral nus pa/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la/ /gang gis dpag med 'di spyad

pa/ /nam mkha' dpag tu med pa bzhin/ /gzugs dang dbyibs kyang yong med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang de bzhin te/ /thogs pa med cing dpag tu med/ /sems can thams cad de dag kun/ /theg pa chen po 'di zhon la/ /theg pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na/ /gtos rgya che

zhing mang du shong / /gal te theg chen yon tan dang / /theg pa gcig tu spyod pa ni/ /bskal pa dpag med rab bshad kyang / /mtha' ru rdzogs par yang mi nus/ /theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / /theg pa chen po dam pa mchog /sems thag theg chen 'di blangs na/ /byang chub

shing drung mngon par 'gro/ /'ching ba med cing thogs med pa/ /bla na med pa'i theg pa 'di/ /theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas/ /byang chub dkyil du 'dug par 'ong / /rten 'brel bcu gnyis rnam rtag ste/ /sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can

thams cad la/ /theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya/ /gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni/ /'phel ba'am 'grib pa yong med de/ /nam mkha' bzhin du kun shong bas/ /theg pa chen po bsam mi khyab/ /de phyir sems can thams cad kyis/ /brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste/ /mngon par
