shes pa rnams dang ni/ /ye shes chen po thob par bya/ /lha yi tshogs dang lha yi bdud/ /mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na/ /theg pa chen po'i skyabs song la/ /mngon shes drug dang ldan par byos/ /rig pa gsum dang rnam thar gsum/ /des ni bdud dang mu stegs 'joms/ /log

par lta ba'ang 'jil bas na/ /theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'jig pa dang / /dge rtsa phun sum tshogs 'gyur bas/ /theg chen mthu ni bsam mi khyab/ /de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'/ /'jig rten pa yi chos rnams dang / /'jig rten 'das pa'i

chos thams cad/ /slob dang mi slob de dag kun/ /theg pa chen por kun 'dus so/ /sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror spyod pa ni/ /log par lta ba dang ni sdig grogs bsten/ /gang zhig theg pa chen por ma dad pa/ /des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'joms mi nus/ /de rnams

spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba/ /grol thar 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob/ /skyes bu gang zhig don chen shes 'dod pa/ /theg chen bshad pa thos na dga' ba skye/ /de ni theg chen mi ni yin par mngon/ /zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan/ /de yang theg chen

dbang gis rnam par brgyan/ /gang zhig theg pa chen por spyod nus pa/ /de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad/ /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa ni/ /de ni bsod nams dpag med thob pa'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su phyin pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba

dpag med mchod pa dang / /de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo/ /mchod na 'jig rten theg pas thub pa med/ /dpal dang gzi brjid ldan zhing 'khor ba 'joms/ /de phyir theg pa chen po bsam khyab dka'/ /byad gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs

ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub/ /gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni/ /bla na med pa'i dga' ba myong ba yin/ /lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na/ /de phyir theg pa bla med thob par 'gyur/ /tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul mngon du nyi zla sgrib kyang

nus/ /de yang theg chen spyod pa'i dbang gis so/ /rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun spyod pa/ /des ni theg pa chen po thob pa'o/ /sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang / /theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang / /gang zhig theg chen chos la bde gnas pa/ /de ni

tshe dang longs spyod sangs rgyas bzhin/ /yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi yi stobs kyang rnyed/ /dam chos yang dag don la brten pa yang / /theg pa chen po bsgoms pa'i dbang gis so/ /mi 'jigs dang ni stobs bcu ldan pa dang / /mtshan bzang

sum cu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang / /rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes thams cad kyang / /theg pa chen po bsgom pa'i dbang gis so/ /rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste/ 'bru gcig gam/ tshig gcig gam/ tshigs bcad gcig 'chang ngam klog

na bsod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa/ /sdug bsngal kun dang yong 'bral lo/ /nam du'ang ngan 'gror mi ltung ste/ /bde ba'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur/ /gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa/ /phyi ma ma 'ongs

dus ngan tshe/ /mtha' ru sangs rgyas 'grub par yang / /ngas ni lung du bstan par bya/ /gang gis rgyal la rtag gzhol ba/ /rgyal ba'ang rtag tu de la gzhol/ /gang gis rgyal ba'i chos bsrungs na/ /rgyal ba'ang de la bsrung bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang / /

chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus/ /'khor ba'i rgyud las bsgral ba dang / /bdud kyi dpung bcas 'jil yang nus/ /rgyal ba 'od mi 'gyur de las/ /ngas ni mdo sde 'di thos nas/ /bzod par gnas te lung bstan pa/ /shAkya thub ces bya bar grub/ /nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og na/ /

gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/ /ngas kyang lung du bstan par bya/ /gang gis ma 'ongs dus kyi tshe/ /mdo sde 'di yi don shes te/ /blun po rnams la rab bshad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten

mi bzhugs kyang / /mdo 'di 'jig rten gang na bar/ /gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu/ /sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa bzhin/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa las mdo sde 'di mnos te 'chang ba dang / bskal pa 'jig pa'i

tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen

po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad/ deng 'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad na/ las kyi rgyu gang dang gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrubs pas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'grub pa yin te/ gal te ngas rgya cher bshad du bskal pa'i bar du yang bshad pa mi rdzogs pas deng mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do/ /de dag gang zhe na/

'di lta ste sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrung ba dang / yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bla ma la bsu skyal dang / chos nyan pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bsgrub pa la phu dud du byas pas phyag dang

zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan rtsibs stong dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la ma brnyas pas rting pa yangs pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs pas sor mo ring ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms

par byas pas phyag dang zhabs dra bas sor mo bar 'brel ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gos bzang po sbyin pa byin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba zhim po dang / gtsang ma dang / nyams su bde ba byin

pas/ bdun shin tu mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la thos par dga' bas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi g.yo dang mtshang sbed cing bcabs pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par

'gyur ba dang / dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te sems can la rtag tu ston pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas phrag pa'i

lhun mdzes par grub pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi gtsug lag khang ngam/ mchod rten bsgrub pa'i grogs byed par mos pa dang / slong ba rnams la bdog pa med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por pus mo'i lha nga la sleb pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu dge

ba'i chos thams cad bsgrub pa dang / srog gi rim gro byas pas sku che zhing drang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / na ba rnams kyi rtsi sman dang / rim gro dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pas ro bro ba'i mchog thob pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yun ring po nas tshig kyal pa spangs shing

dus su smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par snyoms pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtsod pa rnams sdum pa la dga' bas tshems thags bzang ba'i mtshan dang ldan par

'gyur ba dang / rin po che'i sbyin pa byas pas tshems mnyam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang ngag yid yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa bsdams pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang

sems can rnams la rtag tu tshig 'jam po smra bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / byams pa'i sems bsgoms te rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems thag pa nas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu

bsgrubs pas ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan la bsod nams dang yon tan yod pa rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pas zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / pha dang / ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul bzhin

du rim gro dang / btsun par byas pas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos bstan pa la mos pas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha

dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtam sna tshogs te smra ba spangs pas ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / mkhan po dang / bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa'i tshig yang dag

par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon du spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yon tan dpag tu med par bsgrubs pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can

rnams ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bskul bas shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar dpag tu med pa'i yon tan bsgrubs na mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis de lta bu dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes de skad

ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bdag gis brtags na gang yang dngos po dang mtshan mar ma grub ste ma mchis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brtags na yang de bzhin

gshegs pa'i spyod lam de ma lags na ci'i slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrub ces gsungs/ dkon mchog gsum dang / bden pa bzhi dang / phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos rnams la bdag gis brtags na yang

phyi nang gi rgyu 'bras kun stong pa nyid de/ mtshan ma ma mchis/ smon pa ma mchis/ skye zhing 'byung ba yang ma mthong / 'gag cing nub pa yang ma mthong / sgyu ma dang 'dra ba/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba/ 'bar ba dang 'dra ba/ brag ca dang 'dra ba/ chab kyi zla ba dang 'dra ba/ rus sbal

gyi spu dang 'dra ba/ ri bong gi rwa dang 'dra ba/ nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra ba/ mo gsham gyi bu dang 'dra ba/ gzugs brnyan gyi gos gyon zhing sgyu ma'i glang po che la 'tshal ba dang 'dra ba/ mchis pa yang 'dra ba/ ma mchis pa yang 'dra ba/ de dag ni mchis pa dang ma mchis pa/ mchis pa yang ma

lags/ ma mchis pa yang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma lags/ 'gag pa ma lags/ nang du ma lags/ slad rol ma lags/ mthong ba ma lags/ shes pa ma lags/ dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ngas ni

spyod lam de dag spyad ces gsungs/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis brtags na bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog ma lags/ gso ba ma lags/ skyes bu ma lags/ gang zag ma lags/ shed can ma lags/ shed bdag ma lags/ byed pa po la

sogs pa ma lags/ mig ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ mig dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ rna ba ma lags/ sgra ma lags/ rna ba dang sgra'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ sna ma lags/ dri ma lags/ sna dang dri'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lce

ma lags/ ro ma lags/ lce dang ro'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ lus ma lags/ reg bya ma lags/ lus dang reg bya'i mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul ma lags/ yid ma lags/ chos ma lags/ yid dang chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ rnam par shes pa ma lags/

gzugs ma lags/ rnam par shes pa dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ gzugs ma lags/ sdug bsngal ma lags/ gzugs dang sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi spyod yul yang ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ bdag gi ma lags/ 'gro ba ma lags/ gzugs can ma lags/ phung po ma

lags/ bden pa ma lags/ pa ma lags/ bsdus pa ma lags/ gtor ba ma lags/ 'byung ba ma lags/ 'jug pa ma lags te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /phar bzhud pa ma lags/ tshur byon pa ma

lags/ bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang mi mnga'/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa yang mi mnga'/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyang mi mnga'/ gcig pa yang ma lags/ tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma byon pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma

lags/ dri ma can ma lags/ yongs su dag pa ma lags/ bdag ma lags/ sems can ma lags/ srog dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag la sogs pa yang ma lags/ rtag pa ma lags/ chad pa ma lags/ skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa ma mchis/ sgom du ma mchis/ spyod du ma

mchis/ dor du ma mchis/ blang du ma mchis/ mtha' las 'das pa/ yun du bzhugs pa la gang gi slad du spyod lam rgya cher bsgrubs zhes gsungs zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la

legs so zhes bya ba byin nas legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ yun ring po nas theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i don chub par chud de/ chos so cog kun kyang stong pa nyid du mngon par

shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag pa'i mtha' las 'das te/ yun du gnas par yang shes pas rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya shin tu dang ba gsal ba/ 'dam rdzab kyi nang du lo stong gi bar du bzhag kyang / rang bzhin yong gis dag pas phyir phyung

na yang snga ma kho bzhin te/ khyod kyang de dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid mngon par rtogs la/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pas/ khyed rnams da ltar khams gsum na snyigs ma can rnam lnga'i 'dam rdzab tu gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sems can gyi don byas kyis kyang 'dam

rdzab kyis ma gos pas na don 'di lta bu dag 'dri nus pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu khyod yang nyon cig /'di lta ste/ chos so cog thams cad yang dag par na dngos po med de/ yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod ces bshad/ chos kyi nang du yi ge med la yi ge'i nang du yang chos med do/ /

kun tu spel ba'i phyir yi ge bstan to/ /yi ge'i nang du ni byang chub kyang med/ byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge yang med mod kyi/ don dam par ni yi ge med kyang kun rdzob tu yi ge yod par bshad pas sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang yi ge las gud na mi rnyed do/ /

rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba'ang bden te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa med/ skye ba med/ mi bsgom mi spyod/ bsgom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la mi 'jug /de las ldog cing 'gyur ba'ang ma yin/ skye ba gcig gis dga' ldan gyi gnas su yang ma skyes/

de las babs te yum gyi lhums su yang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems mi gnas pas nga ni skye rgan 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun yang ma bor/ nga ni 'jig rten na bla na med pa'i btsun pa yin no zhes kyang ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tu na cung bzang mo dang

yang ma rtse na/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la sogs pa yang ma bslabs/ stobs dang 'phong rtsol yang ma bsgrun/ sems can yangs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir rgan po mngon sum du bstan pa ni lus la chags pa rnams bkag pa'o/ /nad pa mngon sum du bstan pa ni tshe la chags

pa rnams bkag pa'o/ /shi ba'i mtshan ma mngon sum du bstan pa ni 'dod chags dang nga dang ngar 'dzin pa rnams bkag pa'o/ /dge slong mngon sum du bstan pa ni sems can rnams tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyi lus su mi smon par 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa'i chos brtson par bsgrub

par bya ba'o/ /grong khyer mchog nas byung ste gshegs pa ni khams gsum gyi btson ra nas thar pa dang 'bras bu ma yin pa rnams bstan pa'o/ /slar gzigs pa ni byams sdang mi mnga' bar bstan pa'o/ /de'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku rnam par brgyan cing sems can gyi

bsod nams kyi zhing du bya ba'o/ /dbu skra bregs pa dang / rgyan rnams spangs pa dang / rta tsan ta ka zhabs ring dad pa can la slar bskur ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang dbral bar bstan pa'o/ /kha spu bregs pa ni chos thams cad la mi chags par bstan pa'o/ /kasha ngur smrig gyon pa ni

sems can 'dul bar bstan pa'o/ /drang srong u ta ka dang / a ran ta la chos 'dri rtog bya ba ni rang gi nga rgyal gyi sems 'joms par bstan pa'o/ /lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad pa ni mu stegs 'dul ba'o/ /zhal zas blangs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /

rtswa swa sti ka blangs pa ni chog shes par bstan pa'o/ /rtswa bting ba'i steng du bzhugs pa ni nyam rangs dang g.yel ba rnams 'joms par bstan pa'o/ /lha klu kun gyis bstod cing bsngags pa dang bsnyen bkur byas pa ni yon tan gyi 'bras bu la bkod par bstan pa'o/ /bdud rnams btul ba

ni dpa' ba'i mthu bstan pa'o/ /phyag g.yas pa sa la bstan pa ni bsod nams kyi mthu bstan pa'o/ /sa chen po kun tu g.yo ba ni drin gyi lan ldon par bstan pa'o/ /de ltar mtshan ma med par bsgoms pa'i phyir bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no/ /'di ltar

chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid mngon sum du mkhyen nas/ chos kun mnyam pa nyid du bstan pas ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la thub pa med de/ chos bstan to cog la sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i don bstan pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /dus

gsum gyi bya ba dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos mngon du gsal bar gzigs shing mkhyen pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /bden pa dang yang dag par gsungs pa'i phyir lha dang mi'i mkhan po zhes bya'o/ /gang zhig de ltar bslab cing rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de la

log par rtog pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bslu ba can zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni mi 'byung mi 'jug mi skye mi 'gog ste/ sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes brjod pa dang /

sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da'o zhes brjod pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang yang dag par na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid du rtogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'byung ba'am nub

pa mi mnga' bas rgyal po'i pho brang du yang ma bltam/ byang chub kyi shing drung du yang mya ngan las ma 'das/ mtha' las 'das te yun du gnas pa/ sems can yongs su bsgral par mdzad pa'i slad du dka' thub spyad cing mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan kyang yang dag par na

'gyur ba'am spros pa mi mnga' zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul du gnas te/ khams gsum na sku 'byung ba yang chos kyi sku rnam pa lnga 'byung ngo / /lnga po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sku yon tan can dang / sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes pa

dang / sku sprul cing 'byung ba dang / sku nam mkha' lta bu dang lnga ste/ de la sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi ba ni yang dag pa'i 'bras bu'i mchog mtshan ma thams cad las 'das pa rang gi dbyings la yun du gnas pas na sku yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bgyi'o/ /sku yon tan can zhes bgyi ba ni sems can

mya ngan las bzla ba'i slad du spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing dge ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pas na sku yon tan can zhes bgyi'o/ /sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi ba ni chos kyi mtshan nyid thams cad thugs su chud de mi mkhyen pa mi mnga'/ spyod yul de la yang dag par

mkhyen pa'i stong pa nyid las skyes te/ yang dag par rdzogs pas na sku chos kyi ngo bo nyid las skyes zhes bgyi'o/ /sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung yang lam rgyud lngar dge sdig kun la mngon par bstan cing skyabs su mi mdzad pa ma mchis te/

sprul pa'i rdzas las mtshan du 'gyur bas na sku sprul cing 'byung ba zhes bgyi'o/ /sku nam mkha' lta bu zhes bgyi ba ni nam mkha' mtha' yas pas na chos kyi sku yang mtha' yas so/ /nam mkha' la dpag pa dang gzhal du ma mchis pas na chos kyi sku yang dpag cing gzhal du ma mchis te/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang nam mkha' chen po dang 'dra ba sems can yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du sku rnam pa lngar ston pas na de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba mi mnga'/ 'gag pa mi mnga' bar mngon no/ chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla

ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mngon du sprul cing chos rnam par spel ba lags so zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar chos kyi mtshan nyid la mkhas

pas spyod yul thams cad la bar du chod pa'am thogs pa med de/ rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa stong rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten longs spyod can zhes bya ba der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha dag theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig spyod de/ nyan

thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i ming rna ba'i thog mar yang mi grag na ngan song lta zhig ci smos/ khyod bskal pa de dang 'jig rten der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gzhan nas skyes

bu chen po dag kyang der phyin cing theg pa chen po thar pa phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde mnyan pa dang / blangs pa dang / bcangs par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na sems can gang la las byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas na 'jig rten longs

spyod can gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos sgrub na yang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blang zhing bcangs pa des ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba bcu ma 'das par lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe

de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i

dge 'dun rnams kyi mtshan bstan nas yang seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs te/ seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba ni nges pa'i tshig bstan pa'o/ /nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te/ mya ngan las mi 'da' bar rig pa'o/ /yang sems can thams cad

la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes bstan pa dang / lha'i bdud dang mu stegs la sogs pa spa gong ste/ skyabs kyi dbang du gyur pas na seng ge'i sgra zhes bya'o/ /de ltar bstan nas ljags kyi mtshan rgya chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun khebs par

g.yogs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/

dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma' ba ni sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos zhes bya'o/ /ljags kyi drung nas 'od zer chen po btang ste phyogs bcur snang ba chen po byas so/ /snang ba chen po des mi rtag pa ni rtag par byas/ ma dag pa ni dag par byas/ sdug bsngal can ni

bde bar byas/ ma rig pa ni rig par byas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis reg cing snang ngo cog la ri dang / nags tshal dang / yul sa dang / chu bo'i klung dang / rgya mtsho dang / lcags kyi ri khor yug dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang mtho dma' med par mnyam par

gyur cing nyal nyil dang / ljan ljin med de/ kun kyang yongs su dag par gyur nas 'di lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs na 'jig rten zla gang rnam dag yongs su brgyan dang 'dra'o/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku sprul pa ni/ nam mkha' nas bab pa ni me tog gi char bab pa

dang 'dra'o/ /sa 'og nas byung ba ni sprin dang / na bun byung ba dang 'dra bar nam mkha' yongs su gang ste nam mkha' stong pa cung zad kyang med do/ /sprul pa'i zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par 'tsho skyong zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ /sems can

thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid yod do zhes gsungs/ yang chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid do zhes gsungs so/ /spyod lam de dag gi rgyu 'bras ni theg pa gcig tu zad pa las sems can gyis theg pa rnam pa gsum du mthong zhes bshad nas de ma thag tu kun mi snang bar gyur nas bcom

ldan 'das gdan la bzhugs pa nyi tshe snang ste/ de'i tshe tshogs mang po thams cad kyis sku sprul pa de dag mthong ba ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu ste/ shAkya thub pa yang byams pas 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / gzi brjid mngon par sprul pa de'i tshe tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub

sems dpa' gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu'i bye ma snyed kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/ /nyan thos brgyad khri zhig ni theg pa chen po'i sems bskyed do/ /dge slong stong phrag bcu zhig gis ni dgra bcom pa'i lam thob bo/ /dge slong ma khri brgyad stong zhig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/ /dge

bsnyen khri phrag bzhi bcus ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i lam thob bo/ /dge bsnyen ma 'bum phrag bcu zhig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lam thob bo/ /lha dang mi grangs med pa zhig ni chos kyi mig rdul med pa dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag pa thob ste/ rang gi tshe snga phyi shes pa dang 'dus

byas kyi chos thams cad mi rtag par mthong ngo / /de nas tshogs kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gong du bstan pa bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang / chos kyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang / dge 'dun gyi mtshan thos na yang sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags sam/ chos kyi mthu lags

sam/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags na ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba bgyi/ chos kyi mthu lags na ni chos la gsol ba bgyi/ dge 'dun gyi mthu lags na ni dge 'dun la gsol ba bgyi ba lags na/ gsum char la gsol ba bgyi ci 'tshal/ gong na

gsungs pa theg pa gcig la so so'i skye bos rnam pa gsum du mthong ngo zhes byung na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis kyang gsum du bshad na sems can lta ci zhig smos zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir don de lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu legs te/ nyon cig dang ngas khyod la bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/ chos kyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin/

dge 'dun gyi mthu 'ba' zhig kyang ma yin te/ kun tshogs pa'i mthu bas sangs rgyas ni sems can gyi mgon skyabs kyi pha ma/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/ /sems can bslad pa can sems stor ba slar rnyed de 'khor ba la skyo nas dran pa'i mthu mang pos khams

gsum na nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar 'dod na phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'dis bsgral ba'i gru chen po byed do/ /de bas na rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyang chos so/ /chos kyang dge 'dun no/ /dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /'dus ma byas pa ni stong pa nyid de/ 'dus ma byas pa'i stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas kyi

stong pa nyid dang / nang gi stong pa nyid dang / phyi'i stong pa nyid dang / chen po'i stong pa nyid dang / chung ngu'i stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid du 'dra ste/ de las gzhan med do/ /rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba lta na/ rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa gsum du bsgrub ci dgos zhes bya ba ni

rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi gcig cig nam mkha' stong pas skrag ste/ gar phyin dgur gab kyang nam mkha' dang yong ma bral lo/ /rigs kyi bu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / ngas bshad do cog dge ba thams cad kyi rgyu rkyen dang / dkon mchog gsum

dang / theg pa gsum yang gcig las mi 'da'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras gsol pa/ legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'phags pas bstan pa ltar ni bdag snga nas 'tshal te sems can rnams kyi slad du don de zhu ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa bzhin du mi gnyis mi gsum mo/ /thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni yum/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni shul chen po/ rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ni mig ste/ lta ba log pa rnams sdud pa dang / /

sems stor ba rnams skyong ba dang / ngan song gsum gyi sgo gcod pa dang / bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub kyi sgo 'byed pa dang / nyan thos rnams bzlog pa ste/ /theg pa chen por 'dzud pa'i slad du bdag gis gzungs chen mo'i sngags kyis bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /

sdom pa ma nyams pa dang / mdo sde 'di la sgom zhing bslab par bgyid pa de la yang bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/ /gal te gang zag gang la las mdo sde 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing dgung bdun gyi bar du spyad pa spyod pa la bdud sdig can gyis 'khrug cing / glags lta ba mchis na

bdud sdig can gyis glags kyi skabs mi rnyed par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag mdo sde 'di la rim gro bgyis te/ yun ring por gnas par bgyi ba yang byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du gnas par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs

kyi bu khyod mdo sde 'di la rim gro bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum la rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /ston pa la yang rim gro bya ba dang 'dra'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge sgras bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags 'di skad ces smras so/ /na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na maHsang

g+hA ya/ a dan ti d+hA ra NI/ tad+ya thA A kA sha ni ba bI ni/ sarba d+harmA ni ba ni/ i sha ma da/ pi pa sha na/ pi ma la su pa ri/ d+harma ni kha na/ ba ra ru ni tsa ya ta ma le/ tsa le/ hu lu hu lu/ shi bi te/ man+t+ra man+t+ra/ man+t+raHswA hA/ sngags 'di dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas

shing mchod rten la lan bdun bskor ba bgyi/ de ltar gdugs bdun gyi bar du mdo sde gzhan la mi bsam par gdugs gcig kyang dus gsum du phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di la sems rtse gcig tu bgyi ste sems gzhan du mi g.yeng bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das gzungs

sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas khri phrag brgyad brgyas gsungs pa ste/ deng 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod pa lags so/ /gal te 'ga' zhig gzungs 'di la smod pa mchis na sangs rgyas de dag la smod par 'gyur ro/ /gzungs 'di la smod pa ni tshe rabs du ma'i bar du byang chub

tu bsgrub kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ srid pa gsum las kyang mi 'da'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sngags 'di ni sems dran pa nyams pa rnams sems slar rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs 'di lan cig tsam rna bar thos sam/ thos nas yi ger bris te/ sha dang chang mi

'tshal bar sdom pa la gnas shing bdag nyid rtsen 'jo la sogs pa spangs te/ 'du 'dzi'i nang du mi 'jug la/ rgyun du byams pa chen po spyod cing bsam gtan la gces par 'dzin na gang zag de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i sgrib pa gsum gyi sdig lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /

gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu sems thag pa nas blang ba dang / bcang ba dang / nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa dang / yi dam du mi bskyud par bgyid na gang zag de mngon par byang ma chub kyi bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom

ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i sgra la bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod dkon mchog gsum gyi rim gro bya ba dang / byams pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams srid pa gsum las 'don pa dang / bslab pa mang po grangs med pa la phan pa dang /

bde ba chen po bya ba'i phyir ston pa'i sgo 'byed cing log par lta ba rnams bzlog ste yang dag pa'i lta ba la 'dzud pa'i phyir gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa ni shin tu'ang legs so/ /rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad gang dag khyod kyi ming dang sngags kyi sgra thos nas dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de mi smod

na gang zag de tshe 'di nyid la yang bde la/ 'chi 'phos na yang rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong zhing nga yang mthong la/ khyod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang nges par rang gis rig ste the tsom med do/ /kun nas

nyon mongs spangs pa dang / /dge ba kun gyi lam bsgrubs te/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin mthong ba yang / /rnam dag dad pa'i dbang gis so/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las

nyin gcig gam/ dus gcig gam/ mtshan gcig gam/ skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing theg pa chen po tshul bzhin du yid la

byed pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa la bsams na gang zag de ni skad cig ma se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las thams cad yongs su ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /

gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong mas sems kyi rang bzhin stor nas rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad nyams pa dang / mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur

pa rnams phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal na 'di lta bu'i las ngan pa kun ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal ma thag tu sngon sangs rgyas 'od mi 'gyur gyi dus na rgyal bu dge mthong zhes bya ba de'i tshe mi sum

stong dang lhan cig tu skad cig ma der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'thun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las bgyis pa lta zhig bshad kyis mi

rdzogs te/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig grangs ma mchis par bgyis pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bcu gnyis la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi spyan sngar mthol te/ 'gyod tshangs su gsol

zhing mchis na skabs dbye bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu 'jigs pa'i sems bskyed pa'ang dka' la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'ang dka' ste/ mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga mthol

zhing 'chags par 'dod pa ni longs spyod la sogs pa yang sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid mthong du nye bas yid la dran pa bzhin du mthol zhing shogs shig /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye bar gnang ba byams pa'i gsung thos nas

gos tshags bcos te thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal nas bla gos phrag pa g.yas su gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/ /

phyogs bcu'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /yang 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'khrug pa mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su mchi'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su

gsol lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dri brtsegs la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og ma phyogs

kyi sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'bum la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang shar phyogs na skyes bu chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /lho phyogs na skyes bu chen po 'jig rten 'dzin la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /nub phyogs na

kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang phyogs na zla gang la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /bla ma phyogs na nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'og ma phyogs na skyes bu chen po brtan dpal la

phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /yang bdag cag gi mkhan po de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur ba la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs gzhan na sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku

la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar bdag cag gi mkhan po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /skyes bu chen po dri ma med par grags pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /

'phags pa dga' bo dang 'od srung la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam bzhi mngon par 'byung ba rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /byang chub kyi sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /sde snod chen po gsung rab

mdo sde bcu gnyis dang mnyam pa nyid yang dag pa'i mdo sde gzhan bzhugs so 'tshal la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /cha brgyad du bgos pa'i sku gdung ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /da ltar na sku gzugs

bzhugs pa thams cad la yang phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol lo/ /phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dbang phyug dang / bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dang / sa'i lha dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang / shing drung gi lha dang /

drang srong dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / lha'i spyan mnga' ba rnams dang / lha'i snyan mnga' ba thams cad kyi snyan gyis gsan cing mkhyen par mdzod cig /kun dbang du gsol te/ sems can thams cad la ma mthol ma bshags pa zhig mchis na yang sdig pa thams cad byang bar

gyur cig /yang 'di skad ces smras te/ bdag cag thog ma ma mchis pa nas da ltar gyi lus ngan pa 'di thob pa'i bar tu nor cing 'khrul pa'i sems kyis phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa nyon mongs pa dang mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa brjod kyis mi lang ste/ sdig pa'i tshogs bgyis so 'tshal

rang gis ma tshor ma rig pas ngan sems rab tu rgyas te/ tshe phyi ma ma mthong zhing tshe 'di 'ba' zhig mthong bas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags la mos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ring du gyur cing las ngan pas bar du chod nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang bsten cing dge slong dang / dge slong ma la mi rigs

mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / pha dang ma la mi rigs mi tshul ba'i las bgyis pa dang / yang bdag rang nyams kyi dbang gis dge 'dun gyi dkor nor thugs thub tu spyad pa dang / dge 'dun sde lnga la mi rigs mi tshul bar bgyis pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i kun nas nyon

mongs pa'i 'bras bu dpag tu ma mchis par bshad pa'am/ byang chub kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems can bkum pa'am/ chos kyi slob dpon la skur te/ chos la chos ma lags zhes skur/ chos ma lags pa ni chos lags zhes brjod/ de bzhin gshegs pa la

ni mi rtag ces bgyis/ dam pa'i chos la yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang mi rtag go zhes bgyis/ sbyin pa dang shes rab la ni ma mos/ log pa'i chos la dad cing 'dzin pa de dag gi slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ khrel zhing ngo

tsha ba yang dpag tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi

sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol zhing slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad mtshams ma

mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bslab pa zhig par bgyis pa dang / log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / ngag rtsub mo gtong ba dang / dam pa'i chos la skur pa'i las ngan pa de dag 'gyod cing mthol ma myong ste/ sems la gnong ba'am/

ngo tsha ba ma mchis par mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba nges par bgyis par rang gis 'tshal kyang nongs pa bcabs nas 'jigs shing skrag pa dang / gnong zhing ngo tsha ba'i sems thog ma nas ma mchis par dad pa can gyi mchod pa blangs

nas mthol zhing bshags ma myong ste/ dam pa'i chos yun du btsugs te rim gro bgyi ba'i sems ma mchis par rtag tu smos shing brnyas pa dang / ngag gi sgo nas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nongs pa mang po bgyis pa dang / ched na dkon mchog gsum yang med do zhes brjod pa dang / mi

dge ba bcu dang / mtshams ma mchis pa'i sdig de dag bgyis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing khrel pa dpag tu ma mchis te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste phyogs su

snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na/ gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ slan

chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa tshun chad phyin ci log tu lta lta ste/ rtsa ba bzhi ni sbom por bshad/ sbom po ni rtsa ba bzhir bshad/ zhig pa rnams ni ma zhig par bshad/ ma zhig pa rnams ni zhig par bshad/ lci ba

rnams ni yang bar bshad/ yang ba rnams ni lci bar bshad/ dag pa rnams ni ma dag par bshad/ ma dag pa rnams ni dag par bshad pa dang / yang log par lta bas 'jig rten pa'i gtsug lag la bstod cing bsngags nas chos dang mdo sde la ni ma gus te smre ngan gyi gtam rtag tu gleng zhing

brjod pa dang / ma brtags pa'i nor rnam pa brgyad po 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' yang dag pa ni/ bdud kyi tshig go zhes bgyis pa dang / bdud kyi tshig yang dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' zhes bgyis pa dang / mu stegs mkhan gyi tshig la yid ches par

'dzin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthar mya ngan las 'das te med pas dkon mchog gsum yang mi rtag go zhes bgyis nas lus dang sems 'khrul cing phyin ci log tu lta ba dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa yang dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba yang dpag

tu ma mchis te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje mnga' ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag gi sdig pa bskal pa grangs ma

mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas bgyis pa de dag mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ /slan chad kyang mi bgyid par smon to/ /yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa nas tshe lus 'di la thug

gi bar du dge 'dun spyi'i nor ram/ phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ /da ltar bzhugs pa'i dge 'dun gyi nor ram/ dge 'dun sde lnga'i nor ram/ dge slong gang zag gi nor ram/ yon bdag thams cad kyi nor rdzas la brkus pa 'am/ rang nyam du spyod pa dang / yang rang smos

te/ bdag dam pa'i chos bsam gtan bzhi 'am/ 'bras bu bzhi ma thob par thob bo zhes smras pa la sogs pa rkyen de lta bu'i las ngan pa mi dge ba'i rgyu rkyen du gyur te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang pham pa bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / drug dang / dge 'dun gyi lhag

ma bcu gsum dang / ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang / spang ba'i ltung ba sum cu dang / ltung ba dgu bcu dang / so sor bshags pa bzhi dang / bslab pa mang po dang / bdun shin tu lci ba'i chos rnams te/ tshul khrims de dag re re la nyes byas nas pham pa la thug gi bar

du nyams pa dang / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / dam pa'i chos dang / mdo sde zab mo la skur pa dang / log spyod kyi spyad pa spyod pa nas nongs pa bcabs te 'gyod cing mthol ma myong bas nyin mtshan du 'phel zhing skye ba sngon rgyal ba dag gis bshad pa las thos pa ni dam pa'i

chos la skur pa'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa'am/ rtsa ba bzhi pham par gyur pa rnams ma bshags ma mthol na sems can dmyal bar nges par ltung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang skyabs

mdzad par mi 'gyur/ dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyis kyang skyabs dang 'or ba bgyid mi nus so zhes byung bas na de'i slad du deng 'jigs shing skrag pa dpag tu ma mchis/ gnong zhing ngo tsha ba dpag tu ma mchis te/ de'i slad du deng dkon mchog gsum dang / 'das

pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas stong dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku shAkya thub pa la skyabs su gsol lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa dang thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ste/ phyogs su snyoms pa'i yab yum lags/

byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na bdag cag bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / pham pa bzhi dang / mtshams ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i

sdig lci ba rnams mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal na gnang ba'i skabs dbye bar gsol/ yang 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag cag gis sems can rnams dang / bdag cag rang rang gi slad du phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar da mthol zhing bshags par 'tshal lo/ /sems

can thams cad kyis bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis pa tshun chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / pha ma'i drin glo bar ma chud pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa dang / rang gi rigs snyems te/ dregs shing rgyags pa'i tshe kun nas nyon mongs pa'i

las nyam bag tu bgyis kyang nongs par ma mthong bas skye bo blun po'i las bgyis pa dang / sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la bsten cing nyon mongs pas sems 'khrugs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan la chog ma 'tshal te/ mi dge ba'i las rnams bgyis pa dang / 'gro ba bzang mos bslus te 'dod

chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pas gzir cing sems 'khrugs te/ spros pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid gsum gyi sgo nas bstsags pa'i las mi dge ba bdag rang gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan bgyid du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi

rang ba de dag thams cad deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor shags so mthol lo/ /mi 'chab bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs

rgyas la yang bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa yang deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo mi 'chab bo/ /ma rig pa'i dbang gis dam pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi drin glo bar ma chud pa'i slad du bsnyen bkur ma bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag

kyang deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ mi 'chab bo/ blun zhing rmongs pas bsgribs te/ nyam rangs dang rgyags pas mi dge ba sna tshogs bgyis pa'i sdig pa de dag kyang deng so sor 'chags so/ /mthol lo/ mi 'chab bo/ slan chad kyang mi bgyid do/ phyogs bcu'i

sangs rgyas thams cad la bdag cag gis yon phul zhing mchod pas ni ma lus pa'i sems can de dag kun sa bcu la 'khod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu

dge mthong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so skyes bu chen po rang gi las legs nyes kyi rtog pa la mkhas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las la 'jigs pa dang skrag pa skyes nas nyes pa rnams mngon par mthol ba'i steng du sems can gyi sdig mang po yang khyod kyis mthol

zhing bshags pa'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /rang gi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i steng du sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ring du dbral bar byas pas de'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya ba yin te/ rang gi don du smon pa ma yin gyi/ thog mar

sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir khyod ni skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa skyes bu dam pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong la sogs pa mi sum stong gis 'gyod tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan

'das la tshigs su bcad de 'di skad ces bstod do/ bcom ldan nyag gcig gtso bo mchog /khams gsum pha ma thams cad mkhyen/ /thams cad mi mnyam mnyam pa nyid/ /bcom ldan dkon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye bo sbyin gtong rang gi phyir/ /nor rdzas byin cing lan

yang re/ /byams chen rgyal ba de min te/ /dgra gnyen byams dang phan snyoms mdzad/ /rkang gnyis nang na rgyal ba btsun/ /shes rab spyan gyis mkhyen gzigs la/ /brtson 'grus che bdag skyabs su mchi/ /lha gzhan shes rab de ma 'tshal/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar

bzhugs/ /rgyal ba kun la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de bzhin rgyal la skyabs gsol pa'ang / /dus gsum rgyal ba mchod pa bzhin/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa/ gang zhig

sangs rgyas 'grub 'dod pa/ /mang du thos la 'brang bar byos/ /slob dpon dge la bkur byas na/ /sangs rgyas 'grub la yun mi ring / /gang zhig tshul khrims rnam dag spyod/ /de ni dge slong yang dag yin/ /gang zhig stong par sgom nus pa/ /de ni ting 'dzin thob ces

bya/ /gang zhig brtson 'grus spyod nus pa/ /de ni byang chub spyod pa'o/ /gang zhig mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ba/ /de ni dga' ba yang dag pa'o/ /tshul khrims 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang / /rnam dag khrims 'dzin dge slong ma/ /zla ba phyed cing gso sbyong byos/ /chos gos

rnam pa lus gyon te/ /lhung bzed gseg gshang thogs nas su/ /rnam dag bsod snyoms 'gro byas na/ /lha rnams kun kyang dga' 'gyur bas/ /thal mo sbyar cing gus phyag 'tshal/ /ngas kyang lha dang mi rnams kun/ /de yi bya ba byed du gzhug /dper na lha bran

thams cad kyis/ /lha yi dbang po brgya byin la/ /rim gro gus par byed pa bzhin/ /da ltar 'phral du'ang lan thob ste/ /phyi ma'i dus su'ang dpag tu med/ /rab tu byung zhing khrims 'dzin pa/ /sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /nga dang sems

dpa' ma gtogs par/ /'jig rten pa yi mi kun kyang / /rnam dag dad pa'i sems bskyed do/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag kun/ /mya ngan mi 'da' rtag tu bzhugs/ /chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te/ /de ltar mngon par shes pa ni/ /sangs rgyas drin lan lon zhes bya/ /

rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /'jig rten pa yi mi dag kun/ /rnam par 'byed pa'i sems med cing / /theg pa gcig la ma mngon par shes/ /'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa/ /phyogs bcu dang ni da lta'i rnams/ /sangs rgyas theg chen gcig pu la/ /gnyis sam gsum

zhes bya med par/ /de ltar yid la bskyed nas su/ /sems kyis rnam par mi rtog na/ /de lta bu yi mi rnams ni/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /gang zag la la 'ga' zhig gis/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi na/ /rtag tu dad pa'i sems bskyed de/ /

sems can kun la sangs rgyas kyi/ /bdag nyid yod par bshad pa ni/ /de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /gang zhig skad cig dge spyod cing / /lha yi 'bras bu mi re ste/ /cig car bla med lam bsgrubs na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /

rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das phyi na/ /gal te gang zag 'ga' zhig gis/ /yud tsam mdo sde 'di bklags te/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus byas shing / /mkhan la srid zhu mchod byas na/ /de lta bu yi gang zag rnams/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes

bya/ /gang zhig nor rdzas sna 'ga' 'am/ /kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams/ /kun la khyab par sbyin byas na/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /nga yi chos rnams 'jig pa na/ /gang zhig 'ga' la blo bstan nas/ /yud tsam mdo sde 'di mnyan na/ /

byang chub sems dpa' 'bum brgya la/ /mchod pa phul bas de lhag go/ /theg chen mdo sde 'di dag kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub kun gyi yum/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /mdo sde 'di la dran byas te/ /snyoms sems phan tshun gnyis med na/ /rgyal

ba'i drin lan lon zhes bya/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /gang zhig chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe/ /rgyal ba'i drin lan blan 'dod pas/ /skad cig yud tsam sgom byed pas/ /stong khams gang ba'i sems can gyi/ /srog gi sbyin pa byin pa bas/ /bsam gtan

bsgom pa yon tan che/ /gang zhig bsgom la skur pa dang / /dge 'dun 'khrugs par byed pa ni/ /stong khams gsum po gang ba yi/ /mi rnams kyi ni srog bcad dang / /srog chags thams cad bsad dang 'dra/ /de sdig yang ni de bzhin no/ /gang zhig dge spyod mthong ba

la/ /skur pa 'debs shing ma dad pa/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs gcod pas/ /des ni rgyal ba'i lan mi ldon/ /de nas rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan par gnang ba dga' bas tshim nas bstan pa nyid spyi bos blangs te/

tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la/ /gang mang lags shing gang mi mang / /mang dang mi mang gnyi ga yang / /dngos po dmigs su yong ma mchis/ /yang dag mtshan nyid de lta bu/ /chos rnams kun dang mi 'gal lo/ /sems

can kun la byams slad du/ /thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /'phags pa gang nas byon pa nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de nas byon/ /yang dag mtshan nyid ji lta ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin no/ /'phags pa kun gyi bden tshig ltar/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa'ang de bzhin bshad/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /de bzhin gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/ /bzod pa'i go cha brtan pa'i sems/ /sra ba'i gzhu stobs brtson 'grus che/ /rno ba'i mda' ni shes rab mgyogs/ /le lo'i dgra rnams 'joms mdzad cing / /

'jig rten lha dang mi rnams kyi/ /mchod yon phul ba bzhes pas na/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /dgra bcom zhes ni bgyi ba lags/ /rab tu sdug bsngal mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal rgyu yang shin tu mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal zhi ba'i mtshan nyid la/ /zhi ba'i tshul yang rab

tu mkhyen/ /'phags pa'i bden bzhi mkhyen pas na/ /'gyur ba ma mchis bden par nges/ /de bas phyogs bcu'i nang na yang / /mtshan ni yang dag rdzogs zhes bgyi/ /rig pa gsum po mchog brnyes pas/ /spyod lam rnam dag dang yang ldan/ /de slad mtshan ni bcom ldan 'das/ /

mkhyen dang zhabs su ldan zhes bgyi/ /chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen cing / /dam pa'i chos nyid rab brnyes pas/ /thams cad kun la byams slad du/ /dus skabs sbyar zhing thabs kyis bshad/ /skye rga na 'chi rab bsal cing / /bde ba'i gnas su phyin par mdzad/ /de yi slad du rgyal

ba'i mtshan/ /bde bar gshegs zhes bgyi ba lags/ /'jig rten gang nas mchis pa dang / /'jig rten bas pa'i mtha' yang mkhyen/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /'jig rten mkhyen zhes bgyi ba lags/ /thugs rje chen pos sems can bsgral/ /mnyen des dge ba

bstan cing btul/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur/ /tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab spyan/ /thub cing bla ru 'da' ba med/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /bla na med ces bgyi ba lags/ /nyon mongs mi mnga' shes rab ldan/ /rnam grol dam

pa mchog bshad pas/ /de yi slad du rgyal ba'i mtshan/ /lha dang mi yi ston zhes bgyi/ /dus gsum g.yo 'am mi g.yo ba/ /bas sam ma bas chos kun yang / /byang chub shing drung kun mkhyen pas/ /de yi slad du mtshan sangs rgyas/ /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams

rdzu 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas sku nam mkha' la 'phags te zhal so so nas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong po khyed rnams kyi sdig gi rang bzhin ni nang na yang mi gnas/ phyi rol na yang mi gnas/ bar na yang mi gnas

so/ /sems brtan pa'i phyir dge ba'i mthu yang brtan no/ /sems rnam par grol ba'i phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang rnam par grol lo/ /shes rab stong pa nyid kyi phyir sdig gi rang bzhin yang stong pa nyid do/ /dad pa'i mthu che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi mthu yang che'o/ /de bzhin du mthol

bshags te 'gyod tshangs nus pa ni nged rnams mthong ba'i steng du sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'gyod tshangs kyis sdig sbyangs pas rgyun du nga yang mthong la/ deng byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bstan bcos pa dang 'dra bar de bzhin

du 'gyod tshangs byas pa ni nga dang sprul pa'i sku rnams dang / 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang la sogs pa thams cad kyang dgyes par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag kyang dgyes par 'gyur te/ theg pa chen

po'i mdo/ /sde 'di'i rjes su byang chub tu chud par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor zhabs ring ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ sdig can rnams kyis sdig bshags par 'dod na/ rgyal bu dge mthong bzhin du dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub

sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po rnams la/ re re nas dmigs te phyag 'tshal ba nga dang phrad pa dang 'dra ba'am/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed de/ sangs rgyas gcig gam/ sangs rgyas gnyis sam/ sangs rgyas bcu'am/ sangs rgyas brgya'am/ sangs rgyas stong ngam/ sangs

rgyas khri'am/ sangs rgyas grangs med pa'i 'du shes su bskyed de/ mthong ba dang 'dra bar dmigs la/ de bzhin du re re nas dmigs te sems kyis phyag 'tshal na de dag gis bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang thob par 'gyur la/ 'khor ba'i sdig lci ba thams cad kyang sel bar byed do/ /bskal

pa grangs med pa'i bar du ngan song gsum du ltung bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la bde bar gnas par 'gyur bar yang nges te the tsom med do/ /de'i phyir sdig pa rnams mthol zhing bshags par byas la sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed na gdon mi za bar sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rgyal

bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong gis cig car du skad bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de bstod pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan byams shing thugs rje che/ /shAkya'i gdung rigs chos kyi rje/ /tshogs kyi nang na seng ge'i sgras/ /khyab par sems can bsdus pa ni/ /

pha la gzigs pa bu gcig bzhin/ /rnam par 'byed pa yong ma mchis/ /de lta bu yi bla med pa/ /mthong nas de slad gus phyag 'tshal/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu dge mthong dang mi sum stong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag khyed rnams 'di ltar 'gyod

tshangs byas te/ mi 'chab pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshags pas da ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub bo/ /rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gang zhig sems thag pa nas phyogs bcu'i

de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal bar nus pa ni dkon mchog gsum gyi drin gyi lan lon zhes bya ba ste/ de ma thag tu mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byang bar

gyur nas rgyun tu zhugs par 'os pa ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'os pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /phyir mi 'ong bar 'os pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /dgra bcom par 'os pa ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /rang

sangs rgyas su 'os pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu sbyin no/ /byang chub sems dpar 'os pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bras bu sbyin no/ /da ltar mdo sde 'di'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams skye ba gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid thob pa yang phyogs bcu dus gsum

gyi sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings thob pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes thob pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub

sems dpa' la las don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub

sems dpa' la las nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las phyir mi ldog pa'i bzod pa dang / chos sbyin gyi bzod pa dang / chos bzhin

gyi dbyings ldan pa yang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las gzungs dran pa chen po'i sems dang / rang gis rig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub

sems dpa' la las seng ge'i sgra'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes lnga'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /byang chub sems dpa' la las mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /

byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam dang ldan pa yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal ba'i yon no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rje 'jam dpal gyis

bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad nor cing 'khrul pa sems 'khrugs te/ mi dge ba dang mtshams ma mchis pa bgyis pa rnams ji ltar bgyis na sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal

la bka' stsal pa/ gong du bstan pa yin te/ gang la las phyogs su rgyas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba bskyed la

dad pa dang gus pa dpag tu med pas blangs sam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ 'don tam/ yi ger bris sam/ kun chub par byas te/ dben pa'i gnas khang gcig gi nang du dkyil 'khor byas la dri chus chag chag btab ste/ 'phan gdugs bzang pos brgyan cing pog spos

zhim po bsregs nas rgyal ba rnams spyan drang zhing gshegs su gsol ba mang yang rung / nyung yang rung spyan drangs nas bdag khrus dag par byas la/ gos gtsang ma gyon cing lan cig phyi rol che chung du 'gro na khrus lan gcig byas te seng ge'i khri btsugs te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

yun ring du bsgoms la/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can la sogs pa'i lta ba med par mngon par rtogs par bya ste/ dang po pas bye brag phyed cing gsal bar brjod par bya'o/ /de nas dri spos zhim po bsregs la 'khrug sems bsal

cing dran pa yang dag pa dang bsam pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa la sems rtse gcig tu bsam mo/ /de ltar spyod pa rnams 'thun zhing 'dum pa ni mchog ste/ de la mi 'thun zhing rtsod pa ni mthol tshangs su mi 'gyur ro/ /khro ba des kun 'jig par byed de spyod lam dang yang 'gal

bar 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po dran zhing don dam pa bsams la nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du nyal zhing gnyid log tu mi rung ngo / /nyin gcig kyang dus gsum du mdo sde 'di kha ton nam/ klog pa nyin mtshan dus drug tu byas la dri bsung gis mchod cing phyag 'tshal nas mthol tshangs su

byas te/ mdo sde 'di nyan na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / mdo sde bcu gnyis kyi mtshan brjod cing sems thag pa nas mi 'khrugs pa dang / sems thag pa nas mi nor ba dang / sems thag pa nas mi g.yeng ba dang / sems thag pa nas dus kyis 'grus pa dang /

sems thag pa nas nyin gcig pas nyin gcig 'grus pa dang / sems thag pa nas dad pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas dga' ba bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rim pa bskyed pa dang / sems thag pa nas rgyun mi bcad pa dang / sems thag pa nas gzab pa dang / sems

thag pa nas mi 'bral ba dang / sems thag pa nas sdig mi bsams pa dang / sems thag pa nas sangs rgyas dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas chos dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas dge 'dun dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas tshul khrims dran pa dang / sems thag pa nas gtong ba dran pa

dang / sems thag pa nas don dam pa'i lha dran pa ste/ de dag de bzhin du klog pa dang / de bzhin du phyag bya ba dang / de bzhin du sems thag pa nas so sor 'chags shing mthol ba thog ma'i nyin par nas zhag drug tu lon pa'i nang par dri chus yang chag chag btab ste/ lus kyang

spos chus bkru bar bya'o/ /pog spos bzang po bsreg cing sems thag pas mchod pa byas pa de dag de lta bur sems thag pa nas so sor mthol zhing bshags pas phyogs bcur bskul par gyur te/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / byang

chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang 'grogs te sgra dbyangs kyi rjes su khang bu de'i nang du phyin cing mngon du grub pa'i dbang bang bya'o/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du byas na gdon mi za bar sdig 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sdig 'byang bar shes she na/ so

so'i skye bo rnams kyi don dam par da dung ma grub pas rmi ltas kyi mtshan ma la brtag tu byas te/ rmi lam rnam gcig rmis na mtshams med pa rnam gcig 'byang ngo / /rmi lam rnam lnga rmis na mtshams med pa rnam lnga 'byang ste/ des nub mo'i rmi lam na chu klung chen po brgal bar 'dod de zam pa chen po'i

steng du 'gro bar rmis na de ni nges par rnam par grol ba thob pa yin no/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa dang / lus la char bab par rmis na de ni nges par rnam par dag pa thob pa yin no/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag dge 'dun mang po'i nang du zhugs te/ gral du

'dug par rmis na de ni nges par sangs rgyas kyi slob ma yang dag par gyur to/ /gal te de'i rmi lam na bdag mchod rten nam/ gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan mthong bar rmis na de ni chos kyi sgo mo dam par zhugs par gyur to/ /gal te

rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za bar rmis na de'i tshe 'di nyid la yon tan gyi 'bras bu 'grub par mngon no/ /yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge sbyong ma 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa

can gang la las dran pa nyams te/ nor cing 'khrul pas sdom pa'i tshul khrims re re nas zhig pa'am/ nyams pa de bzhin du so sor 'chags shing mthol na sdig mi 'byang mi srid de/ sems thag pa nas ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la

'jam dpal gyis 'di skad ces zhus so/ /bcom ldan 'das cho ga 'di ltar bgyi ba'i tshe mi mang na rung ngam mi rung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi gcig yan chad nyi shu man chad rung ngo / /cho ga 'di ltar spyod pa'i tshe mdo sde gzhan mi bsam mo/ /de ltar mthol

tshangs bgyis pa'i 'og tu phyin chad nyes pa mi byed na de ni mthol tshangs zhes bya'o/ /de ltar dran par gyis shig /bdag cag rnams da ltar 'chi ba las slar 'tsho ba dang 'dra bas da ni bdag tshul khrims bsrung ngo / /da ni bdag brtson 'grus su spyod do/ /da ni bdag theg pa chen po'i mdo sde

klog pa dang / kha ton bgyi'o zhes de'i tshe de'i dus na dran pa de ltar gyis shig /bdag deng nas sdom pa bzung ba ni rdo rje dang 'dra bar sran thub par smon to/ /des de ltar dran pa'i tshe skyes bu dam pa dri ma med par grags pa yang byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa dang lhan cig tu de'i mdun du

'greng ste dbang du byed do/ /'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang 'gyod tshangs kyi mkhan po byed do/ /'phags pa 'od srung yang zhu gnas kyi rten byed do/ /'jam dpal 'di ni sdig pa sbyangs pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o/ /'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /

'di ni gnas thob pa zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gang la la zhig gis rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad dang / sdom pa phyed can dang / khrims bcu dang / gsum la

skyabs su song ba dang / khrims lnga dang / dge ba bcu dang / tshul khrims dang 'dul ba re re nas zhig pa'am/ nyams pa'am/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'am/ mnyam pa nyid la skur pa'i sdig byas pa zhig yod pa de log spyod ma gtogs par so sor ma bshags ma mthol

na mi de tshe 'phos ma thag tu gdon mi za bar mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mnar ma mchis pa'i dmyal ba zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du de ci'i rgyu

ci'i rkyen gyis ltung ba dang / dmyal ba'i dbyibs che chung dang / rnam par smin pa'i sdug bsngal bskal pa'i grangs ji tsam gyi bar du gnas par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol zhes bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal shin tu'ang mkhas so/ /

shin tu 'ang mkhas so/ /don 'di lta bu 'dri ba yang shin tu mkhas te/ legs par nyon la phal mang po rnams kyang legs par soms shig /ngas bye brag phyed par bshad do/ /ji ltar na mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya zhe na/ skad cig kyang

mnar zhing bstir med pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /gcig tu na dgag pa'am/ 'or bar bya ba yang med/ 'gyur ba'ang med de/ tsha ba ni rab tu tsha/ sdug bsngal ba ni shin tu'ang mi bzad pa skad cig kyang mi dal/ skad cig kyang mi sdod cing bar skabs med pa'i phyir mnar med

pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /yang rnam pa gcig tu na/ me chen po 'bar ba/ rab tu tsha ba/ kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing / mched pa khong du zhugs pa'i phyir mnar med pa'i dmyal ba zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/

rigs kyi bu dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i dbyibs ni gru bzhi lham pa dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/ lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor cing steng du yang lcags kyi dra ba rim pa bdun gyis g.yogs te/ 'og tu bar chad brgyad yod do/ /de'i kho ra khor yug tu ral gri'i tshal

rim pa bdun gyis bskor to/ /lcags kyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su nags tshal ral gri lo ma can yod do/ /lcags kyi khang pa bar chad brgyad po brtseg mar 'dug ste/ rim pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/ /de'i grwa bzhir zangs kyi khyi chen po bzhi 'dug pa lus kyi

bong tshad ni 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi bcu la/ mig ni klog gi 'od bzhin/ mche ba ni ral gri'i sdong po dang 'dra/ so ni spu gri gtams pa'i ri dang mtshungs/ lce ni lcags kyi mchil ba bzhin/ sder mo ni lcags kyi gsal shing dang mtshungs/ mjug ma ni lcags kyi sbrul

dang 'dra/ spu'i bu gu re re nas 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar ba 'byung ste/ de'i dud pa mnam pa ni 'jig rten gyi rdzas mnam pa gang dang yang bsgrun du med do/ /dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhi la sgo re re na dmyal ba'i srung ma brgyad 'dug go/ /mgo ni

srin po'i mgo /kha ni srin po'i kha dang 'dra ste/ mgo la rwa brgyad yod pa/ lag na lcags kyi gsal shing thogs so/ /ra ba rim pa bdun gyi nang logs su lcags kyi rgyal mtshan grangs med pa zhig yod de/ rgyal mtshan gyi mgor me byung ba ni chu mig dang 'dra

bar 'byung ngo / /lcags 'ju ba'i khu ba 'bab pa ni kun tu khyab par 'bab ste/ dmyal ba'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i steng na zangs po che brgyad yod pa'i nang na lcags khol ba'i khu ba khar lud cing sgo bzhir bab pa/ dmyal ba'i nang du gang bar 'bab bo/ /khang pa bar chad re re'i nang

na yang lcags kyi sbrul chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pas khar gdug pa'i me skyug cing ra ba kun tu gang bar gtong ngo / /sbrul gyi sgra sgrogs pa ni 'brug sgra chen po zer ba bzhin no/ /lcags kyi thu lum chen po'i char bab pa yang mnar med pa kun tu gang ngo / /der sdug bsngal mi bzad pa ni 'bum phrag brgyad

khri ste sdug bsngal gyi nang na sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i nang na mi bzad pa kun kyang der 'dus te dpe zla med do/ /mnar med pa'i dmyal ba de'i sgo bzhir sgo re re'i phyi rol tu 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched cing 'bar ba lho byang shar nub bsnol zhing phyad par rgyu'o/ /'bar ba yang lcags kyi ra ba kho ra

khor yug dpag tshad brgyad khri nas steng lcags kyi dra ba la thug gi bar du yar thal mar thal zhing bla za 'og dang / phyogs bzhir kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal cig car ldang ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin no/ /rtsa ba bzhi dang / sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa

dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnyam pa nyid la skur pa 'debs pa rnams mdo sde 'di las 'byung ba bzhin mthol tshangs ma byas la/ gnong bskur ba'am/ khrel ba med na mi de tshe 'di 'phos ma thag tu stobs tshan po che'i dpung pa brkyang zhing bskums pa tsam gyis

mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus kyang de'i nang du gang ste/ tsha ba'i gzir bas phongs nas kha gdangs mig btsums mig gdangs kha btsums kyang kha 'thams pas smra ma nus so/ /de sdig mang ba'i phyir ral gri 'khor lo grangs med pa du ma zhig nam mkha'

nas char bzhin 'bab ste/ klad par phog cing rkang par byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni sngar gong du bshad pa bzhin brgya stong khri phrag tu bsgyur ba'o/ /gang la la rtsa ba bzhi po tshang bar zhig par gyur na sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong ba ni bskal pa chen po lnga rdzogs kyi bar

du'o/ /sdom pa brgyad 'jig pa ni de las gyur cig gis mang ngo / /mtshams med pa lnga yang gyur cig gis mang ngo / /mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde la skur pa 'debs pa yang gyur cig gis mang ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la dmod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang /

dge slong dang / dge slong ma tshangs par spyad pa la dri ma can du spyod pa dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la dbang za ba dang / ma la g.yem pa rnams gong ma dag las kyang gyur cig gis bskyed do/ /log spyod kyi rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gtan chad pas na mas kyang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba

nas mi thar ba ni der ma gtogs so/ /de la sogs pa'i sdig can rnams sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe 'bar ba'i me shin tu mched pa khong du zhugs te rmugs nas 'chi'o/ /de nas srin po dmyal ba'i srungs mas lcags kyi gsal shing sa la brdabs te/ sos sos zhes bos pa dang /

bos pa'i sgra bzhin du yang sos yang sos nas nyin mtshan gcig la lan khri ni 'chi/ lan khri ni 'tsho ste/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po nyams su myong ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no/ /nam zhig mnar med pa'i dmyal ba nas slar phyin na yang tshul khrims bshig pa dang / yon

bdag dad pa can gyi yon blangs pa'i las kyis yang dmyal ba chung ngu rnams kyi nang du 'jug ste/ de la dmyal ba grang sbrebs pa dang / dmyal ba mun nag pa dang / dmyal ba rab tu tsha ba dang / dmyal ba spu gri so gtams pa dang / dmyal ba ral gri 'khor lo dang / dmyal ba

me'i shing rta can dang / dmyal ba phyi sa'i 'dam dang / dmyal ba chu tshan dang / dmyal ba me mur klung dang / dmyal ba nags tshal ral gri lo ma can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi shal ma ri ka ba can dang / dmyal ba lcags

kyi khri can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi 'khor lo can dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi phug dang / dmyal ba lcags kyi thu lum dang / dmyal ba bsdus 'joms thug ri can dang / dmyal ba zangs khu lud dang / 'di rnams so so re re'i nang du yang lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du

nyon mongs nas gzod thar te/ 'on kyang rtag tu ma rabs su skyes la/ tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar du dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra mi thos so/ /brgya la dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang srid/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ma phrad na ni slar yang dmyal bar ltung

ngo / /nyes byas kyi sdig pa rnams ma mthol ma bshags na dmyal bar sdug bsngal myong ba yang rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha'i lo grangs lta bur lo khri phrag brgyad brgya'i bar du nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de la ltung ba rnams kyi sdig pa ni de las nyis gyur du bskyed do/ /dge 'dun gyi lhag

ma yang de las nyis gyur du bskyed do/ /sdig can de dag gis sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba'i tshe tshig gzhan mi phyin te/ AM pa pa/ AM ta ta/ AM la la/ AM ba ba 'ba' zhig zer zhing 'dug go/ /de bas na sdig can rnams rings par so sor mthol zhing bshags la/

dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su song bar gyis shig /'jam dpal yang 'di lta ste/ sdig pa myur du bsal cing / 'byang bar 'dod na mdo sde 'di'i nang nas 'byung ba bzhin du so sor mthol bshags te 'gyod tshangs byos shig /cho ga nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du nyin gcig za

gcig tu byas la/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i tshe mi chen po'i mtshan dang / mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshan dang / mi g.yo ba'i mtshan dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtshan dang / 'od zer can gyi

mtshan dang / ye shes yongs su rgyas pa'i mtshan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang ldan pa'i mtshan dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i mtshan rnams bsam par bya'o/ /yang gcig tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i yid

dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug par bya'o/ /yid 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te slar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/ /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te shes rab sgron

ma'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /shes rab sgron ma las langs te chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid las langs te mtshan ma 'od zer can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /mtshan ma 'od zer can las langs te seng ge'i nga ro'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /

seng ge nga ro las langs te seng ge sprug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /seng ge sprug pa las langs te rgya mtsho yid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /rgya mtsho yid las langs te kun tu ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /kun tu ye shes las langs te gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /

gzungs kyi phyag rgya las langs te kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /kun tu snang ba'i lus gzugs can las langs te chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /chos kyi dbyings nyid las langs te seng ge'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /

seng ge'i rgyal po las langs te chos kyi rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /chos kyi rgyal po las langs te bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /bdud rnams kyi mtshan ma 'gog pa las langs te stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /stong pa

nyid kyi shes rab las langs te stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa las langs te chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes las langs te gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus

gzugs can gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /gnas thams cad du khyab pa'i lus gzugs can las langs te sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /sems kyi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa las langs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mtshan nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs te rdo rje'i gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /rdo rje gtsug tor las langs te rgya mtsho thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /rgya mtsho thams cad

las langs te gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /gzungs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul gyi rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul rgya mtsho las langs te sangs rgyas thams cad kyi

rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i rgya mtsho las langs te gdod thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya

mtsho'i sgor 'jug par bya'o/ /mtha' med mu med pa'i rgya mtsho'i sgo nas langs te yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug /yid 'gog pa dang zhi ba las langs te rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnam par grol ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya'o/ /'jam dpal nga

mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las dad pa skad cig ma'i sems bskyed de/ mdo 'di yi ger 'dri ba'am/ klog pa'am/ kha ton du skad cig mar dran te/ bsam pa'i 'du shes dang / dran pa'i 'du shes dang /

rtogs pa'i 'du shes su dad pa'i sems grub na skad cig mar bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdig phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur ro/ /ma rig pa'i sgrib pa yang gtan bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu 'tsho skyong

zhing gzhes te mya ngan las mi 'da' bar mngon no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mthu chen thams cad dang / /dud 'gro glang po ma rungs dang / /bud med g.yem dang ma rungs klu/ /dpag tu med pa'i

ma rungs rnams/ /ba su dang ni ma skyes dgra/ /lha sbyin dang ni sor mo'i phreng / /lus dang sems kyis sdig spyad pas/ /dmyal ba mnar med ltung 'os kyang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /dad pa bskyed de phyag 'tshal phyir/ /thub pa mya

ngan 'da' ba'i khar/ /bskal pa grangs med phyir bshol lo/ /ma ga d+hA yi skye bo dag /kun kyang byang chub sems bskyed pa'ang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/ /kau di n+ya la sogs dang / /nyan thos lnga brgya rnam dag

gis/ /ma 'ongs dus su 'tshang rgya ba'ang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /gus par phyag bya'i dbang gis so/ /mu stegs dang ni bram ze dang / /sngags 'chang chen po drang srong bcu/ /da ltar dgra bcom grub pa yang / /'das pa'i phyogs bcu

dus gsum gyi/ /rgyal ba rnams la phyag bya'i yon/ /dam pa'i don la chud pa dang / /phyogs bcu rgyal ba'i zhing rnams la/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad/ /tshe dpag med par skyes pa yang / /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba la/ /gus par

phyag bya'i dbang gis so/ /rgyal bu dge mthong 'di lta ste/ /sngon nga rgyal por byed pa'i tshe/ /drang srong chen po sbyin zhes bya/ /de tshe sangs rgyas ma byung ste/ /bram ze lnga brgya rnams zhig la/ /kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang / /khang khyim dang ni mal cha'i bar/ /lo

grangs nyi shu tshang bar du/ /rab tu byung ba'i mchod pa phul/ /ngas ni de tshe bsgo ba la/ /khyed rnams byang chub sems bskyed cig /bram ze lnga brgya de dag gis/ /mchod pa phul ba blangs kyis kyang / /dkon mchog gsum la ma dad pas/ /mod bzhin nga la slar

smras pa/ /'jig rten nang na byang chub dang / /rnam par grol ba med do zhes/ /de skad smras par ngas thos nas/ /mnyam nyid mdo sde bsrung ba'i phyir/ /bram ze lnga brgya'i srog bcad do/ /bram ze de dag tshe 'phos nas/ /dmyal ba mnar med ltung bar 'gyur/ /

sems can dmyal bar lhung nas su/ /dran pa rnam gsum g.yos nas kyang / /dus gsum rgyal la phyag byas so/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo sde dang / /byang chub dge 'dun dad bskyed de/ /dran pa rnam gsum byas pas na/ /mod la dmyal nas byung ste dong / /'jig rten

zil mngar rnga ru skyes/ /tshe ni bskal pa chung bcu thub/ /de yang gus pa'i sems kyis su/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal la phyag bya'i yon/ /bram ze de dag thams cad kyis/ /thog mar skur pas dmyal ltung yang / /phyis ni dad pas mod la thar/ /byang chub sems
